Lne Weeks Jr ws found gulty  cptl murder n t deth  Vrgn Stte Trooper Jose Cvzos Durng t penlty phse   trl t prosecut s  prove two ggrvtng crcumstnces Weeks' defense presented 10 wtnesses n mtgt Durng delrts t jurs sent t trl judge  note skng wtr f ty leved Weeks gulty  t lest e  t ggrvtng crcumstnces t ws tr duty  ssue t deth penlty  wtr ty must decde wtr  ssue t deth penlty   lfe sentence In respdng t trl judge ly referred t jury  tr nstructs whch stted: "If  fnd  t evdence tht t Commlth hs proved yd  resble ubt etr  t two [ggrvtng crcumstnces] nd s  tht lterntve  re unnmous tn   fx t punshntt deth  f  leve  ll t evdence tht t deth penlty s not justfed tn  shll fx t punshntt lfe mprsnt" T defense counsel objected rgung  t judge  nstruct t jury t  fnd e    t ggrvtng crcumstnces nd stll mpose  lfe sentence In fndng e  t ggrvtng crcumstnces nd fter csderng t evdence n mtgt t jury returned  unnmous verdct fxng Weeks' punshnt t deth On ppel  t Vrgn Sre Ct Weeks' presented 47 ssgnnts  err  whch  ssgnnt  err respectng t judge's nsrng t jury's quest b mtgtng crcumstnces ws numr 44 T ct ffrd Weeks' cvct nd sentence Weeks' pett  federl hs relef ws ultmtely dened

In 1952 Arz nvoked t US Sre Ct's gnl jursdct  relve  dspute wth Cln  t extent  ech stte's rght  use wter  t Col Rver T Unted Sttes ntervened seekng wter rghts  hlf  fve Indn reservts Culmntng n Arz I t Ct ld tht t Unted Sttes hd reserved wter rghts  t fve reservts In  1964 decree t Ct specfed t wter enttlents  t prtes nd t reservts  ld tht t wter rghts  t reservts   subject  djustnt n t event tht t reservts' dsputed boundres re fnlly determned Trefter n Arz II t Ct ccluded tht t reservts' boundres hd yet   determned Ultmtely t Quechn Tr (Tr)  t Ft Yum Indn Reservt nd t Unted Sttes entered n greent returnng lnd encompssng  25000 cres  dsputed boundry lnds not ttred  tht reservt n erler ltgt In 1983 t Ct  Clms csented  t settlent T Tr nd t Unted Sttes tn fled clms seekng ncresed wter rghts  t Ft Yum Reservt In 1989 t Ct grnted t mot  Arz Cln nd two muncpl wter dstrcts (Stte prtes)  reopen t 1964 decree  determne wtr t Ft Yum Reservt ws enttled  clm ddtl boundry lnds nd f  ddtl wter rghts T Stte prtes sserted tht t Ft Yum clms  t Tr nd t Unted Sttes re precluded  Arz I nd  t Clms Ct csent judgnt

T Orgnc Act  Gum provdes tht tht "f no [slte ] cntes [ G nd Leutennt G  Gum] receves  mjty  t votes cst n ny elect runf elect shll  ld" T Elect Commss certfed tht t Democrtc slte  Crl TC Guterrez  g nd Mdelene Z Bdllo  leutennt g hd defeted t Republcn slte Joseph F Ad nd Felx P Cmcho Guterrez nd Bdllo hd receved  mjty  t votes cst  gurntl sltes n t 1998 Gum generl elect   not receve  mjty  t tl numr  bllots tht voters cst due  voters selectng wrte-n cntes people votng   sltes nd blnk bllots T opposng Republcn slte s  wrt  mndmus derng  runf elect Accdng  Ad nd Cmcho t phrse "n ny elect" ns t mjty s sured  t votes cst n t entre elect not smply n t rce  g Guterrez respded tht "votes cst" nt ctul votes cst  g nd leutennt g rtr thn bllots n whch t g's ctest s left blnk T Dstrct Ct ssued t wrt nd t Ct  Appels ultmtely ffrd nterpretng t sttuty phrse "mjty  t votes cst n ny elect"  requre tht  slte receve  mjty  t tl numr  bllots cst n t generl elect

Rt Crpenter ws ndcted  chrges  ggrvted murder nd ggrvted robry pleded gulty nd sentenced  lfe mprsnt wth prole possble fter 30 yers On drect ppel Crpenter unsuccessfully chllenged ly t length  t mnmum sentence After unsuccessfully pursung stte post-cvct relef nd represented  new counsel Crpenter petted t Oho Ct  Appels  reopen  drect ppel  t ground tht  gnl ppellte counsel hd en csttutlly neffectve n flng  chllenge t suffcency  t evdence sptng  cvct nd sentence T ct dsmssed t pplct s untly nd t Oho Sre Ct ffrd Crpenter tn fled  federl hs cpus pett rsng t suffcency--t-evdence clm nd llegng tht  ppellte counsel ws csttutlly neffectve n not rsng tht clm  drect ppel T Dstrct Ct determned tht whle t suffcency clm hd en procedurlly defulted t neffectve-ssstnce--counsel clm  excuse tht defult; ccluded tht Crpenter's ppellte counsel ws csttutlly neffectve; nd grnted t wrt T Ct  Appels ccluded tht t neffectve-ssstnce--counsel clm  serve s cuse  excuse t procedurl defult  t suffcency clm regrdless  wtr t neffectve-ssstnce--counsel clm hd en procedurlly defulted; nd found prejudce  counsel's flure  rse t suffcency--t-evdence clm  drect ppel

Roy Lee Johns hd en servng t n federl prs  multple drug nd frerms feles wn two   cvcts re declred nvld T Dstrct Ct dered  mdte relese Johns's 3-yer term  servsed relese tht ws yet   served  t remnng cvcts tn nt n effect As  result  servng t  t two nvld cvcts Johns hd served 25 yers' o much prs t After  relese Johns fled  mot  credt t excess two nd e-hlf yers  ws erreously ncrcerted wrd  three-yer servsed relese sentence T Dstrct Ct dened relef explnng tht t servsed relese comnced  Johns's ctul relese  ncrcert not e In reversng t Ct  Appels ccepted Johns's rgunt tht  servsed relese term comnced not  t dy  left prs  wn  lwful term  mprsnt expred

Al Mrtnez-Slzr ws chrged wth  vrety  federl nrcotcs nd ps fenses T Dstrct Ct llotted  10 perempty chllenges exercsble n t select  12 jurs After prospectve jur D Glrt ndcted severl ts tht   fv t prosecut Mrtnez- Slzr's counsel chllenged   cuse T ct declned  excuse Glrt After twce objectng unsuccessfully  t -cuse rulng Mrtnez-Slzr used  perempty chllenge  remove  Subsequently Mrtnez-Slzr exhusted ll   perempty chllenges Trefter Mrtnez-Slzr's counsel  not object  t fnl setng  t jurs Mrtnez-Slzr ws tn cvcted  ll counts On ppel Mrtnez-Slzr rgued tht t Dstrct Ct bused ts dscret n refusng  strke Glrt  cuse nd tht t err used e   perempty chllenges wrgly T Ct  Appels greed tht t Dstrct Ct's refusl  strke Glrt  cuse ws n buse  dscret Ultmtely t ct found tht t Dstrct Ct's err resulted n  volt  Mrtnez- Slzr's Ffth Andnt due process rghts cuse t ced   use  perempty chllenge curtvely whch mpred  rght   full complent  perempty chllenges T Ct  Appels ld tht t err requred n umtc reversl

T Fr Lb Stndrds Act  1938 (FLSA) permts gnntl enttes  compenste tr employees  t wk  grntng tm compensty t n leu  csh pynt If t employees  not use tr ccumulted compensty t t employer must py csh compenst  certn crcumstnces Hrrs County Texs found tht o mny  ts deputy srffs hd o mny hs  ccrued compensty t Ferng  budget crss t county pted  polcy  whch ts employees   dered  scdule compensty t t specfed ts n der  reduce t mount  ccrued t tht  otrwse requre csh pynt Edwrd Chrstensen nd 128 otr deputy srffs n Hrrs County leved ty hd t rght  use tr compensty t wn ty sw ft T srffs sued clmng tht t FLSA es not permt n employer  compel n employee  use compensty t n t bsence  n greent permttng t employer    T Dstrct Ct ruled n fv  t srffs ccludng tht t polcy volted t FLSA In reversng t Ct  Appels ld tht t FLSA  not ddress t ssue n quest nd thus  not prohbt t county  mplentng  compensty t polcy

In 1996 t Msschusetts Burm Lw whch restrcted stte enttes  buyng goods  servces  compnes ng busness wth Burm ws pssed Afterwrds Cgress l mposed mndty nd cdtl sncts  Burm Busnesses wth tes  Burm lnded  Msschusetts' "restrcted trde" lst T lst c  nclude 34 mrs  t Ntl Fegn Trde Councl (Councl)  n-prt dvocte  Arcn compnes tht  busness brod T Councl fled sut gnst Stepn Cros t Msschusetts Secretry  Admnstrt nd Fnnce nd otr stte fcls n federl ct clmng tht t stte ct uncsttutlly nfrnges  t federl egn ffrs por voltes t Fegn Comrce Cluse nd s preempted  t Federl Burm Lw T Dstrct Ct permnently enjed t stte ct's encent nd t Ct  Appels ffrd T ct l found tht t Msschusetts Burm Lw volted t Sremcy Cluse cuse t stte ws ctng n n re  unque federl ccern egn polcy   blnced tled pproch

textdata: Mcl Wyne Wllms ws sentenced  deth fter  ws cvcted  two cptl murders Ultmtely Wllms s federl hs relef n whch  requested n evdentry rng  three csttutl clms regrdng t frness   trl whch  hd tred unsuccessfully  develop n t stte-ct proceedngs T Dstrct Ct grnted Wllms' evdentry rng Hover e ny rng   ld t Ct  Appels grnted t Commlth's requests  n ergency sty nd   wrt  mndmus nd prohbt T Commlth rgued tht Wllms' evdentry rng ws prohbted  federl lw s nded  t Antterrsm nd Effectve Deth Penlty Act  1996 (AEDPA) On remnd t Dstrct Ct dsmssed Wllms' pett ctng t AEDPA sttute nd fndng tht Wllms fled  s "ctul nnocence" In ffrmng t Ct  Appels found tht Wllms  not stsfy t sttute's cdts  excusng  flure  develop t fcts   clms nd brred   recevng n evdentry rng

Cln's "untry busness" nco-clcult system  determnng t Stte's txble shre   multstte cpt's busness nco uthzes  deduct  nterest expense T system ever permts use  tht deduct ly  t extent tht t mount exceeds certn --stte nco rsng  t unrelted busness ctvty   dscrete busness enterprse Hunt-Wess Inc s  success n nterest   nmclry cpt tht ncurred nterest expense Cln dsllod  deduct  t expense nsr s t hd receved nuntry dvdend nd nterest nco Hunt-Wess chllenged t vldty  t dsllce T Cln Ct  Appel found t dsllce csttutl T Cln Sre Ct dened revew

Roger Reeves 57 nd Joe Oswlt n  md-thrtes re servss n dfferent Snders Plumbng Products Inc deprtnts Reeves' dutes ncluded mkng sure wkers   servs re  t nd t wk nd loggng  dt Reeves' deprtnt ws mnged  Russell Cldll 45  ws respsble  revewng Reeves' wk Cldll nd t compny's drect  mnufcturng Po Csnut tht product n Revees' deprtnt ws wn cuse employees re ten bsent comng n lte nd levng erly Csnut dered n udt whch reveled nurous tkeepng errs nd msrepresentts  Cldll Reeves nd Oswlt Csnut recomnded tht Reeves nd Cldll  fred nd subsequently tr employnt ws termnted Reeves fled sut llegng tht  hd en termnted cuse   ge n volt  t Age Dscrmnt n Employnt Act  1967 (ADEA) At trl Snders ctended tht Reeves ws fred cuse   flure  mntn ccurte ttendnce recds Reeves ttempted  demstrte tht t explnt ws  pretext  ge dscrmnt nd ntroduced evdence tht  hd ccurtely recded t ttendnce  employees   servs nd tht Csnut hd demstrted ge-relted ny wn delng wth  Ultmtely t cse nt   jury whch returned  verdct  Reeves In reversng t Ct  Appels ccluded tht Reeves hd not presented suffcent evdence  sustn  fndng  ge-bsed dscrmnt

textdata: In 1997 Mr Ohler ws rrested nd chrged wth mptt  mrjun nd possess  mrjun wth t ntent  dstre fter  cusms nspect notced tht e hd tmpered wth e  Ohler's vn nter pnels nd dsced pproxmtely 81 pounds  mrjun Bee t trl t gnnt fled n lmne mots  dmt Ohler's pr fely cvct s chrcter evdence  Federl Rule  Evdence 404(b) nd s mpechnt evdence  Rule 609()(1) Al e t trl t Dstrct Ct dened t mot  dmt t cvct s chrcter evdence After t gnnng  t trl t ct ruled tht f Ohler testfed evdence  r pr cvct   dmssble  Rule 609()(1) Whle testfyng Ohler dmtted  drect exmnt tht s hd en cvcted  possess  thmptmne n 1993 Subsequently Ohler ws found gulty On ppel Ohler chllenged t Dstrct Ct's n lmne rulng llg t gnnt  use r pr cvct  mpechnt purposes In ffrmng t Ct  Appels ld tht Ohler wved r object  ntroducng evdence  t cvct  r drect exmnt

textdata: After Terry Wllms ws cvcted  robry nd cptl murder;  punshnt ws fxed t deth In stte hs cpus proceedngs  judge determned tht  cvct ws vld Hover t judge l found tht Wllms' counsel's flure  dsc nd present sgnfcnt mtgtng evdence volted  rght  effectve counsel nd recomnded tht   re-sentenced Rejectng t t Vrgn Sre Ct ld tht Wllms hd not suffered suffcent prejudce  wrrnt relef In hs cpus proceedngs  t Antterrsm nd Effectve Deth Penlty Act  1996 (AEDPA)  federl trl judge l found tht t deth sentence ws csttutlly k  neffectve-ssstnce grounds T ct  t AEDPA ccluded tht t Vrgn Sre Ct's decs "ws ctrry   nvolved n unresble pplct  clerly estblsd Federl lw s determned  t Sre Ct  t Unted Sttes" In reversng t Ct  Appels determned tht t  not cclude tht t Vrgn Sre Ct's decs  prejudce ws n unresble pplct  stndrds estblsd  t Sre Ct

Durng questng b  robry  ws cnected  Chrles Dckers mde sttents  uthtes dmttng tht  ws t getwy drver n  seres  bnk robres Dckers ws tn plced  rrest T tmng   sttent s dsputed T FBI nd locl detectves testfed tht Dckers ws dvsed   Mrnd rghts estblsd n Mrnd v Arz nd wved tm e  mde  sttent Dckers sd  ws not red  Mrnd wrnngs untl fter  gve  sttent After  ndctnt  bnk robry Dckers fled  mot  spress t sttent tht  mde  t ground tht  hd not receved Mrnd wrnngs e ng nterrogted T gnnt rgued tht even f t Mrnd wrnngs re not red t sttent ws voluntry nd tree dmssble  18 USC Sect 3501 whch provdes tht " cfess shll  dmssble n evdence f t s voluntrly gven" T Dstrct Ct grnted Dckers's mot fndng tht  hd not en red  Mrnd rghts  sgned  wver untl fter  mde  sttent  t ct  not ddress sect 3501 In reversng t Ct  Appels cknowledged tht Dckers hd not receved Mrnd wrnngs  ld tht sect 3501 ws stsfed cuse  sttent ws voluntry T ct ld tht "Cgress encted sect 3501 wth t express purpose  legsltvely rulng Mrnd nd restng voluntrness s t test  dmttng cfesss n federl ct"

textdata: In 1997 n explos  bd Mllrd By Drllng Rg 52  ol nd gs explt brge klled  njured severl wkers whle t brge ws drllng  ll n Lousn's terrtl wters T Cost Gurd's subsequent nvestgt  not ccuse Mllrd  nythng   note tht t brge ws not n "nspected vessel" subject  comprensve Cost Gurd regult T Occtl Sfety nd Helth Admnstrt (OSHA) tn cted Mllrd  volts  t Occtl Sfety nd Helth Act (Act)  1970 Mllrd chllenged OSHA's jursdct  ssue t ctts  t grounds tht Rg 52 ws not  "wkplce"  sect 4()  t Act nd tht sect 4(b)(1)  t Act pre-empted OSHA jursdct cuse t Cost Gurd hd exclusve uthty  prescr nd ence occtl sfety nd lth stndrds  vessels  s Rg 52 Rejectng  rgunts n Admnstrtve Lw Judge found tht Rg 52 ws  "wkplce"  t Act nd ld tht t Cost Gurd hd not pre-empted OSHA's jursdct In reversng t Ct  Appels ld tht t Cost Gurd's exclusve jursdct  t regult  sen's wkng cdts bd vessels  s Rg 52 precluded OSHA's regult  sect 4(b)(1) nd tht t pre-empt encompssed  nspected nd unnspected vessels

A 1977 ndnt  t Clen Ar Act creted t Prevent  Sgnfcnt Detert progrm (PSD) whch requres por compnes tht wnt  mke emsss-ncresng modfcts  tr fcltes  frst pply  permts Beten 1988 nd 2000 Duke Energy Cpt (Duke) mde tnty-nne extensve mprovents  ts por plnts wth obtnng PSD permts Wn t gnnt lg wth Envrntl Defense nd severl otr envrntl gros sued Duke t compny pted   PSD regult explctly defnng "modfct"  purposes  PSD s ny chnge tht ncreses t hly rte  emsss   fclty Duke's mprovents ncresed t numr  hs t plnts remned open nd tree l ncresed t tl nnul emsss  t plnts But snce t mprovents left t hly rte  emsss unchnged Duke rgued tht t  not hve  obtn PSD permts T gnnt countered  ctng t Envrntl Protect Agency's current nterprett  t PSD regults whch holds tht  por compny mkng mprovents tht ncrese t hs  opert  ts plnts es need  obtn  permt n ll cses wre cstruct s nvolved
T Dstrct Ct ruled n fv  Duke T judge refused  rely  t EPA's current nterprett rulng tht t ws ncsstent wth t wdng  t PSD regults Envrntl Defense ppeled  t Fth Crcut Ct  Appels nd t Crcut Ct ffrd t Dstrct Ct's decs T Fth Crcut pted  tht t 1977 PSD ndnt hd tken ts defnt  "modfct" drectly   1975 Clen Ar Act ndnt ccernng t New Sce Permnce Stndrds progrm (NSPS) In t 1975 ndnt t term "modfct" explctly excluded mprovents tht rely ncrese t hs  opert   fclty Tree t Fth Crcut ld t EPA  not hve sttuty uthty  nterpret "modfct" dfferently  t PSD progrm Envrntl Defense ppeled  t Sre Ct wth t dded rgunt tht t Fth Crcut never  hve rd t cse cuse chllenges  Clen Ar Act regults cn ly  br n t DC Crcut

On ppel t US Ct  Appels  t Sxth Crcut ffrd It ld tht t stte ws prevented  t Double Jeoprdy Cluse  reltgtng t Sre Ct  Oho's determnt tht Mr Bes ws ntlly retrded

Edmund Boyle ws cvcted  t Unted Sttes Dstrct Ct  t Estern Dstrct  New Yk  rcketeerng rcketeerng csprcy bnk burglry bnk burglry csprcy nd ttempted bnk burglry He ws sentenced  151 mths mprsnt Mr Boyle ppeled rgung tht t gnnt's cse gnst  ws fctully ctrdcty In  trl t gnnt chrged tht t robry ws n ct  t Boyle Crew enterprse Hover n  prevous cse t hd chrged tht t robry ws n ct  t New Sprngfeld Boys enterprse Boyle mntned tht t ctrdct volted  rght  due process gurnteed  t Ffth Andnt
T Unted Sttes Ct  Appels  t Secd Crcut ld tht t gnnt's cse ws not fctully ctrdcty It resed tht "[n]othng dcttes tht  sngle cr cnnot  commtted  two enterprses wkng getr ech n nce  ts  nterests" Thus t trl ct  not volte Boyle's Ffth Andnt due process rghts

T s t thrd hs cpus ppel  petter Gry Brdd Ce fter  1982 cvct n  Tennessee stte ct  severl fely counts ncludng frst degree murder nd robry  use  dedly ce T jury found tht Ce hd bludgeed two elderly people  deth whle hdng  fter  robry Ce's ntl ppel  t Tennessee Sre Ct  follg  cvct fell  def ers: t ct ruled tht lthough errs hd en commtted  t trl ech  tm hd en "hrmless" nd  not wrrnt turnng Ce's cvct He respded  twce flng hs cpus petts llegng volts  severl csttutl rghts ppelng  ll t wy   t Ct   ts hvng  cse remnded wth n  vew severl   clms stll unrelved
In  thrd ppernce e t US Ct  Appels  t Sxth Crcut Ce rsed two mn pts  ctent Frst  cld tht  ws enttled  relef cuse t jury n  trl hd gd nvld ggrvtng fcts   sentencng rng tre enttlng    new rng T rgunt ws rejected  t Sxth Crcut whch found tht t Tennessee Sre Ct hd cducted  stsfcty hrmless err test  t ssue T ct pted  tht hs petts   grnted ly fter fndng tht  stte ct rulng hs "resulted n  decs tht ws ctrry   nvolved n unresble pplct  clerly estblsd federl lw" Becuse Tennessee hd not brdged ny federl lws t Sxth Crcut dened Ce relef  t frst ssue
Ce l rgued tht t Sxth Crcut hd erred wn n  prevous ppel t hd ld tht  clms reltng  t prosecut's mproper wthholdng  evdence hd en procedurlly defulted Ce rgued tht  cse t t Ct's "exceptl crcumstnces" test s set  n Westsde Motrs v Olszewsk  rulng t procedurl defult rule nd rerng t ssue T Sxth Crcut ce gn dsgreed rulng tht Ce hd fled  s "cuse nd prejudce"  t prt  t prosecut T Sxth Crcut dened Ce's hs ppel  ll counts

In Mrch 2005 Jesse Mtejo ws cvcted nd sentenced  deth  t murder  Lews Ferrr At  trl t prosecut submtted s evdence  letter  pology  wrote  t vctm's wfe Mtejo wrote t letter t t suggest   detectve  ccompned  n  serch  t murder p Bee t serch Mr Mtejo ws red  Mrnd rghts nd wrote n explnt   prtcpt n t serch Hover no e n t serch prty knew ncludng Mr Mtejo tht  hd en ppted n ttney t s mnng Mr Mtejo ctended  tse crcumstnces tht t Sxth Andnt brred t ntroduct  t evdence snce  ttney ws not present wn  wrote nd submtted t letter  pology
T Sre Ct  Lousn ld tht t letter  pology Mr Mtejo wrote ws vld evdence It found tht Mr Mtejo wved  Sxth Andnt rght  counsel It explned tht wn counsel ws ppted Mr Mtejo remned mute nd  not cknowledge t T ct resed tht thng yd "mute cquescence" s requred  trgger t protects  t Sxth Andnt

Three cldted cses center round wtr  not t EPA surpssed ts federl uthty  ghng t pros nd cs  systems   used t wter ntke coolng structures rtr thn smply employng t  dvnced technology vlble  t mrket T clms br  envrntl gros nd cpts llege tht t EPA's cost/neft nlyss volted t Clen Wter Act (CWA)  ledng  t use  structures tht re nsuffcent  protect qutc gnsms  ng hrd  klled s requred  t CWA

T Cfee County Albm Srff's Deprtnt pprended Benne Herrng n July  2004 Up serchng Herrng's vehcle fcers dsced thmptmne n Herrng's pocket nd  gun  t set   truck Hover t stut ws complcted  t fct tht t ntl serch hd en mde   fulty rrest wrrnt T wrrnt stll ctve n t neghbng Dle County Srff's Offce ws sposed  hve en reclled fve mths pr ever e hd ccdentlly fled  remove t  t computer system Herrng fled  mot  spress t llegedly "lleglly obtned" evdence ever t US Dstrct Ct  t Mddle Dstrct  Albm dened Herrng's mot nd sentenced   27 mths n prs
T US Ct  Appels  t Eleventh Crcut ffrd t cvct sttng tht lleglly obtned evdence  ly  spressed wn ng   "result n pprecble deterrence"  future polce mscduct In  pett  certr Herrng pted  n Arknss cse wth nerly dentcl fcts tht hd co  t otr wy notng tht "s polcng cos ever  relnt  computerzed systems t numr  llegl rrests nd sercs bsed  neglgent recdkeepng s posed  multply" T Ct grnted certr  Februry 19 2008

A gro  cgrette smokers br t clm gnst Altr t cgrette mnufcturer n federl ct n Mne T smokers sserted tht Altr's dvertsent clmng tht ts product ws "lght" nd hd "lored tr nd ncotne" csttuted msrepresentts  t Mne Unfr Trde Prctces Act T Unted Sttes Dstrct Ct  t Dstrct  Mne grnted summry judgnt n fv  Altr  t clm
T US Ct  Appels  t Frst Crcut ever reversed t lor ct nd found n fv  t plntff smokers T ct ld tht t Mne Act ws not preempted etr explctly  mplctly   smlr federl ct t Federl Cgrette Llng nd Advertsng Act nd tht Altr's sserts  n fct csttute msrepresentts  t Mne Act

T plntffs n t cse re comprsed  lb gnzts sung fcls  t Stte  Idho T gnzts clm tht Idho's Voluntry Ctrs Act (VCA) voltes tr Frst Andnt free speech rghts  restrctng tr blty  prtcpte n ny ctvtes t VCA defnes s "poltcl" T Stte fcls cceded t uncsttutlty  mny  t VCA's provss ever ty rgued  t vldty  prohbtng pyroll deducts  "poltcl ctvtes" T US Dstrct Ct  t Dstrct  Idho ld t pyroll deduct provss csttutl s ppled  t stte gnnt  uncsttutl wn ppled  prvte nd locl gnnt employees T Stte fcls ppeled ctendng tht t provss   eqully pplcble   gros
T US Ct  Appels  t Nnth Crcut ld t dstrct ct's rulng tht t pyroll deduct provss  not  ppled  prvte nd locl gnnt employees cuse t Stte hd provded no "compellng justfct"    Furtr t ct stted tht t fcls hd fled  s tht t cse   reved  t  relxed stndrd   "n-publc" um

In 2005 t New Yk Stte Attney Generl gn nvestgtng possble rcl dscrmnt n t rel estte lendng prctces  severl ntl bnks T Attney Generl requested tht t mplcted bnks turn  certn n-publc nmt  d t nvestgt T Clerng House Asct (CHA)  cstum  ntl bnks ncludng severl nvolved n t nvestgt fled  lwsut n  New Yk federl dstrct ct  prevent t Attney Generl  ctnung  nvestgt T CHA rgued tht t Offce  t Comptroller  t Currency (OCC) t federl gency chrged wth seeng ntl bnks ws pproprtely respsble  regultng t bnks' complnce wth ctvtes tht fll  t Ntl Bnk Act (NBA) nd tree precluded stte fcls lke t Attney Generl  ng  In respse t Attney Generl rgued tht t Federl Housng Act (FHA) provded n except  t OCC's le stewrdshp  t NBA nd tree uthzed  nvestgt T dstrct ct grnted t CHA's request  n njunct nd spped t Attney Generl's nvestgt
On ppel t US Ct  Appels  t Secd Crcut sustned t njunct gnst t Attney Generl's nvestgt  used t decs n  seprte cse fled  t OCC nd utlzng dfferent rgunts    Here t ct  ppels ld tht t dstrct ct lcked jursdct  decde t FHA clm It resed tht snce t Attney Generl hd not yet fled ny lwsuts gnst t bnks  nvestgt t ssue  wtr t FHA provded n except  t encent  t NBA ws not rpe  djudct

In 1964 t Nvjo Nt entered n  ctrct wth Sentry Roylty Compny  t mnng  col  ts lnd T ctrct clled  roylty pynts  t Nvjo Nt not  exceed 375 cents per t  col mned Hover t ctrct llod  t Secretry  t Inter  djust t roylty rte   "resble" level fter tnty yers At t end  tnty yers t Nvjo Nt ws ng pd t equvlent  2 percent  t proceeds  t mnng opert As stpulted  t ctrct t Nvjo Nt entered n dscusss wth Pebody Col Compny (rly Sentry Roylty Compny)  djust t roylty rte After dscusss fled t Nvjo Nt sked t Secretry  t Inter  relve t dspute T Deprtnt  t Inter's Bureu  Indn Affrs recd n ntl decs  set t roylty rte t 20 percent T decs ws delyed  t recomndt  t Secretry  t Inter Unknst  t Nvjo Nt t Secretry hd en etng wth executves  t Pebody Col Compny  requested t dely Fcng dre ecomc crcumstnces t Nvjo Nt greed   roylty rte  125 percent whch ws pproved  t Secretry  t Inter

In July 2005  jury n  federl dstrct ct cqutted F Scott Yeger  csprcy wre frud nd securty frud  hung  20 counts  nsder trdng nd 99 counts  mey lng n relt   nvolvent wth Enr Brodbnd Servces T dstrct ct declred  mstrl  t counts t jury hung  Trefter t Unted Sttes gn ndcted Mr Yeger   pt  t mstred counts On nterlocuty ppel Mr Yeger rgued tht n cquttng   securtes frud t jury "necessrly found tht   not hve nsder nmt" nd tree collterl espple prevents t gnnt  retryng   nsder trdng nd mey lng
T Unted Sttes Ct  Appels  t Ffth Crcut ld tht collterl esppel es not br retrl n Mr Yeger's cse It recognzed tht Mr Yeger hd t burden  provng t jury necessrly found tht  ws not gulty  nsder trdng He  not s  jury tht found  not gulty  nsder trdng nd "ctng rtlly"  hve cqutted   nsder trdng nd mey lng T ct resed tht cuse t ws uncler t jury's rtle  ts decss Mr Yeger's mstred counts  not prevent  retrl   counts

On August 5 2008 Joel Perez nd Crlos Cruz drove   Sll stt n Arlngt Heghts Illnos wth Cruz t t l Ty t wth Alejndro Dz  ws wkng wth Drug Encent Agency ("DEA") fcls Dz nstructed tm  et  t  dfferent loct  complete t del Insted Perez wlked   ner Denny's wre Alexnder Vsquez wted   n t drver's set   blck Ptc Bnevlle Perez got n t pssenger set  t Bnevlle nd clled Cruz tellng  tht  ws not wllng  follow Dz Cruz wlked  t Denny's wre  ws ntroduced  Vsquez Dz clled Cruz  sk  ty re not follg  Cruz nd  tht ty wnted  complete t del n t Denny's prkng lot tellng  "We got t mey re" Vsquez echoed t sttent
Dz ctcted  DEA hndler Agent Js Chk Lw encent gents surrounded t prkng lot n tr vehcles; severl fcers pprocd t Bnevlle  rrest Vsquez Cruz nd Perez Cruz sde t cr rsed  hnds n surrender Vsquez ever mdtely put t Bnevlle n reverse strkng two squd crs He tn shfted gers nd ded  n gent Agent Chk stepped n frt  t Bnevlle nd commnded Vsquez  sp  ws ced  dve   t wy T Bnevlle ded st  t estbound lnes  Algqun Rod
Severl mnutes lter polce found t Bnevlle bnned n  Wlmrt prkng lot A stnder ld t polce tht  sw two n run  t vehcle n  McDld's Vsquez nd Perez rn n t McDld's  ts ktcn tn splt  Arlngt Heghts polce fcers quckly pprended tm ever Ty found  cell phe  Vsquez nd severl cell phes  t ground ner Perez; recds ndcted severl clls ten Vsquez's cell phe nd  phes pprently lgng  Perez Polce mpounded t Bnevlle nd lter found $23000 n csh hdden n  secret comprtnt
A federl grnd jury ndcted Vsquez wth csprcy  possess wth ntent  dstre  thn 500 grms  cocne nd wth ttemptng  possess wth ntent  dstre  thn 500 grms  cocne At trl Agent Chk testfed tht  nstructed Dz  hve Cruz nd  "custs" et Dz t  gs stt n Arlngt Heghts In  trnscrpt  t cll ten Cruz nd Dz ever Cruz ly referred   sngle cust Vsquez's counsel ttempted  mpech Agent Chk  t pt  t judge found t dfference   trvl lmtng Vsquez's rght  cross-exmnt nd  refresh Agent Chk's my wth t trnscrpt T gnnt ntroduced Vsquez's prevous drug cvct n evdence  demstrte Vsquez's ntent;  ws cvcted  delng drugs wth Perez n 2002
Vsquez clled Perez's wfe Mrn s  wtness  testfy Mrn Perez testfed tht s clled Vsquez e t events n quest  sk   pck  Joel Perez t t ste  t fled drug del mplyng tht Vsquez ws tre  ccdence In respse t gnnt ntroduced trnscrpts nd udo recdngs  cversts ten Mrn Perez nd r husbnd s evdence  bs Tse ndcted tht Mrn Perez spoke  r husbnd b  possble ple del; Mrn Perez l nted tht Vsquez's ttney hd ld r tht "ebody s gg  lose" T trl judge llod tse trnscrpts nd recdngs   dmtted  s Mrn Perez's bs nd  t truth  tr ctents
T jury found Vsquez gulty  t chrge  csprcy  not gulty  t chrge  ttemptng  possess cocne
T US Ct  Appels Seventh Crcut ld tht Vsquez's prevous drug cvct ws properly ntroduced n evdence T ct rejected Vsquez's clm tht t polce's serch  t Bnevlle volted  Fth Andnt rghts notng tht Vsquez bnned t cr nd tht t polce hd probble cuse  leve tht t mey  t drug trnsct ws n t Bnevlle T ct l rejected Vsquez's clm tht t trl ct volted  Sxth Andnt rght  elct testmy  t cross-exmnt  Agent Chk T trl ct found t dstnct ten "custs" nd "cust"   trvl nd t ct ld t fndng   wthn t trl ct's dscret
In  splt decs t ct turned  t testmy  Mrn Perez holdng tht t evdence  cversts ten Mrn Perez nd Vsquez's counsel re properly dmtted  s bs nd ncsstency wth pr sttents Whle notng tht t judge mproperly nstructed t jury tht t recdngs   csdered s evdence  t truthfulness  tr ctents t ld t nstruct    hrmless err It pted  otr wlmng evdence  Vsquez's gult ncludng  ttempt  escpe cpture nd  prevous cvct  drug delng It ld tht t jury  hve cvcted Vsquez bsent t ntroduct  t trnscrpts nd recdngs n quest
Judge Dvd Hmlt dssented  t pt le descrbng t recdngs s prejudcl nd ndmssble He remnded t mjty tht t err s ly hrmless f t ct s cvnced Vsquez  hve en cvcted bsent t err He used  dfferent test thn t mjty lookng  wtr  not t err ctred  t cvct He noted tht Vsquez ws never drectly recded  nted  n n ny  t recdngs nd tht gnnt gents re not wre   nvolvent untl  rrest Judge Hmlt rgued tht Mrn Perez' testmy b Vsquez ws thus plusble evdence  nnocence wth t recdngs  recd

T Fr Lb Stndrds Act ("FLSA") ws encted n 1938  protect t ll-ng  wkers It mposed  bselne t wge  employers  employees  wk  ty hs  ek Tre ws n except  t rule  "sde slesn" defned  t Secretry  Lb ("Secretry") s n employee se prmry duty s mkng sles  obtnng ctrcts nd  s prmrly nd regulrly engged sde  t employer's fce Chrspr nd Buchnn fled sut n August  2008 llegng tht Glxo's prctce  requrng t wk wth ddtl py volted t FLSA's t provss Both prtes fled  summry judgnt nd t dstrct ct found  Glxo greeng tht t plntffs fell wthn t FLSA's "sde slesmn" except
T US Ct  Appels  t t Nnth Crcut ffrd t dstrct ct's rulng T Secretry fled n mcus cure bref n spt  Chrspr nd Buchnn's post rgung tht wn  PSR promotes phrmceutcl products  es not receve tems  vlue n exchnge   products  es not fll wthn t "sde slesmn" except  t FLSA T ct rejected t Secretry's rgunt ever resng tht t defnt s  smple prrotng  t Cgressl sttute;  defnts requre less deference  cts cuse ty re not nterpretve Insted t ct pted  Chrspr nd Buchnn's trnng n sles --nd tr experence n sles s  qulfct  employnt  Glxo-- s evdence  tr sttus s "sde slesn" T ct noted tht t phrmceutcl ndustry self-regulted mrketng  cts much lke otr ndustres self-regulte drect--csur mrketng

In Oct 2001 Qulty Stes --  ntl compny -- nd ts ffltes comnced bnkrtcy proceedngs Wn lyng f employees Qulty Stes ssued severnce py s prt  ts employees' gross nco nd repted t pynts  federl nco tx purposes s "wges"  W-2 ms As requred  "wges" t Federl Insurnce Ctrs Act (FICA) tx ws pd  severnce pynts FICA s  tx mposed  wges erned  fund Socl Securty nd Medcre;  employer nd employee py prt  t tx T employee's prt s wthld   pycck Qulty Stes ctends tht severnce py es not qulfy s "wges"  rtr pynts   Splentl Unemploynt Beneft (SUB) pln tht re not txble  FICA SUB s  cpte progrm tht cretes severnce pynts n t event  nvoluntry termnt; SUB pynts  not qulfy s "wges"  FICA cuse ty re gven fter termnt   job rtr thn  wk completed

Sprnt chllenged IUB's der  flng  complnt n  stte ct nd federl dstrct ct llegng tht federl lw preempts t IUB's decs In der  proceed wth t federl complnt frst Sprnt fled  mot  sty t stte cse untl relut  t federl cse In turn t IUB fled  mot skng t federl ct  bstn nd dsmss t cse  t ctrne  Younger v Hrrs Generlly t ctrne sttes tht  federl ct shll bstn  rng  cse f tre s  thret  nterference wth  stte ct proceedng nvolvng mptnt stte nterests T dstrct ct grnted IUB's mot nd dsmssed Sprnt's federl complnt Sprnt ppeled  t Unted Sttes Ct  Appels  t Eghth Crcut whch ld t dstrct ct's bstent  determned tht  sty  t federl proceedngs ws  pproprte thn dsmssl

Lexmrk Interntl Inc (Lexmrk) s  lrge producer  prnters nd ter crtrdges In 2002 Lexmrk sued Sttc Ctrol Compents Inc (SCC) nd lleged tht SCC volted Lexmrk's ntellectul property wn t mnufctured mcrochps used n t repr nd resle  Lexmrk ter crtrdges SCC fled  counterclm nd rgued tht Lexmrk mg otr thngs volted t Lnthm Act  enggng n flse dvertsng T dstrct ct dsmssed SCC's Lnthm Act clms  lck  stndng T US Ct  Appels  t Sxth Crcut reversed t rulng nd ld tht t lor ct employed t wrg test  estblsh stndng
T Sxth Crcut reled  t "resble nterest" test  estblsh stndng  t Lnthm Act  unlke ts sster crcuts  not use t AGC Fcts whch use t s stndrds s   estblsh n nttrust clm Under t test  clmnt must demstrte 1)  resble nterest gnst t lleged flse dvertsng nd 2)  resble bss  levng tht t lleged flse dvertsng wll dmge tht nterest
case_name: Lexmark International v. Static Control Components

After Jke LMott retred  boxng  nd Frnk Peter Petrell (F Petrell) creted two screenplys nd  book bsed  LMott's lfe Tse wks re regstered wth t Unted Sttes Copyrght Offce n 1963 1973 nd 1970 respectvely In 1976 LMott nd F Petrell sgned  wrtten greent tht grnted t exclusve rghts  t book nd t screenplys  Chrtf-Wnkler Products Inc whch n turn ssgned  rghts   subsdry  Metro-Goldwyn-Myer Studos Inc (MGM) Unted Artsts Cpt In 1980 Unted Artsts Cpt regstered  copyrght  t flm "Rgng Bull" bsed  LMott nd F Petrell's wk Wn F Petrell ded n 1981 whch ws stll wthn t gnl 28-yer perod  t copyrght  renewl rghts pssed   rs
In 1991 Pul Petrell (Petrell) t dughter  F Petrell fled n pplct  t renewl  copyrght rghts  t 1963 screenply In 1998 Petrell's ttney ctcted MGM nd sserted tht Petrell hd obtned t rghts  t screenply nd ts dervtve wks whch ncluded t move "Rgng Bull" nd tht MGM ws nfrngng   rghts MGM rgued tht t 1963 screenply ws  collbt ten LMott nd F Petrell  MGM retned t rghts  t screenply  t greent wth LMott MGM l rgued tht tre ws no "substntl smlrty  protectble elents" ten t 1963 screenply nd t flm In 2009 Petrell sued MGM  copyrght nfrngent nd t federl dstrct ct grnted summry judgnt  MGM  t ctrne  lcs whch prevents  legl clm  ng enced f  lg dely n flng t clm dversely ffected t defendnt's blty  fght t clm T US Ct  Appels  t Nnth Crcut ffrd

Sect 125  t Avt Trnsptt Sfety Act (ATSA) sttes tht n r crrer  voluntrly repts suspcous trnscts  hv shll not  "cvlly lble" T mmunty es not pply  dsclosures mde wth "ctul knowledge" tht t dsclosure s flse nccurte  msledng Lkewse t mmunty es not extend  n r crrer tht mkes  dsclosure wth "reckless dsregrd" s  ts truth  flsty
Wllm Hoeper  plot  Ar Wscsn mde f unsuccessful ttempts  co certfed  fly notr type  rcrft fter Ar Wscsn dsctnued use  t type  plne tht Hoeper hd prevously ploted Durng  fth nd fnl opptunty  pss t test Hoeper brtly ended t test cuse  leved tht t test dmnstrts re delrtely sbotgng  efts  pss One test dmnstrt knew tht t Trnsptt Securty Admnstrt (TSA) hd ssued  frerm  Hoeper n  role s  federl flght deck fcer (FFDO) FFDO plots re not llod  crry t frerm whle trvelng s pssengers T dmnstrt booked Hoeper   flght  t testng center n Vrgn  Hoeper's ho n Denver nd tn clled t TSA  rept tht Hoeper ws  dsgruntled nd possbly rd employee In respse TSA fcls rrested nd sercd Hoeper
Hoeper sued Ar Wscsn n  Col stte ct nd lleged defmt  Vrgn lw Ar Wscsn moved   drected verdct bsed  t rgunt tht t ws mmune  cvl lblty  ATSA Ar Wscsn l rgued tht Hoeper  not prove "ctul mlce" cuse ts sttents re "substntlly true" nd tree protected  t Free Speech Cluse  t Frst Andnt T trl ct dened t mot  dsmss T jury found tht Ar Wscsn's sttents  t TSA re flse nd tht t mde t lest e sttent wth reckless dsregrd  t truth  t jury wrded Hoeper dmges A Col ppellte ct ffrd t verdct T Col Sre Ct ld tht t trl ct's submss  t mtter  t jury ws mproper; ever t err ws hrmless n t cse cuse Ar Wscsn ws not enttled  clm mmunty  ATSA T Col Sre Ct  ld tht substntl evdence spted t jury's fndng tht t sttents re flse
case_name: Air Wisconsin Airlines Corp. v. Hoeper

In August 2000 Vlee Ncole Ttlow lped  unt Blle Rogers murder  lthy uncle Dld Rogers After Ttlow ws chrged wth frst-degree murder t prosecut fered   ple brgn In exchnge  testfyng gnst Blle Rogers Ttlow  pled gulty  mnslughter nd receve  reduced sentence After csultng wth  ttney Ttlow ccepted t del Hover e sentencng Ttlow spoke   srff's deputy  suggested tht  wthdrw  gulty ple nd csult notr ttney Ttlow follod t deputy's dvce hred  new ttney nd wthdrew  gulty ple
Follg  trl  jury cvcted Ttlow  secd-degree murder nd sentenced   20--40 yers n prs T led Ttlow  ccuse  secd ttney  neffectve ssstnce  counsel  llg   wthdrw t gnl gulty ple Both t trl ct nd t Mchgn Ct  Appels rejected Ttlow's clm Ttlow petted t Mchgn Sre Ct  r  cse  ty refused   
Ttlow tn petted  federl hs cpus relef  t dstrct ct dened  clm s ll T dstrct ct ld tht Ttlow fled  et t stndrd  turnng  stte-ct cvct  t Antterrsm nd Effectve Deth Penlty Act ("AEDPA") T Ct  Appels  t Sxth Crcut reversed t lor ct's decs nd dered t stte  refer Ttlow's gnl ple greent T ppellte ct ld tht Ttlow's secd ttney ws neffectve  flng  nvestgte  clms  flng  obtn cunts  t frst ttney nd flng  cvnce Ttlow  tke t ple brgn

Beten 1969 nd 1980 Dr Mt Mor wked wth Dr Meczyslw Mrowsk  develop t mplntble crdter defbrllt (ICD) nd t crdc resynchrzt trpy devce (CRT)  devces tht re nt  tret dfferent knds  rt flure Mrowsk Fmly Ventures (MFV) ld  ptents nd lcensed tm  Gudnt Cp In 1991 Medtrc  mnufcturer  dcl devces nd eqnt entered n  sublcense greent wth El Llly ∓ Co Gudnt Cp's predecess-n-nterest regrdng tse ptents T greent oblgted MFV  nm Medtrc whch tems re ced  whch ptents nd f Medtrc dsgreed Medtrc  retn ptent rghts nd fle   declrty judgnt  n-nfrngent  t ptents In Oct nd Novemr  2007 MFV dentfed severl Medtrc products tht t leved nfrnged  ts ptents nd Medtrc subsequently sued   declrty judgnt  n-nfrngent
In t nch trl n dstrct ct t ct relyng  precedent stted tht t ptent holder rs t burden  provng tht nfrngent occurred nd found n fv  Medtrc MFV ppeled nd rgued tht t burden flls  t lleged ptent nfrnger  prove tht nfrngent  not occur T Unted Sttes Ct  Appels  t Federl Crcut ld tht cuse Medtrc s t prty seekng relef  t ct t rs t burden  prove tht t  not nfrnge  MFV's ptents
case_name: Medtronic, Inc. v. Boston Scientific Corp.

textdata: Hrvey N Levn ws hred s n Illnos Assstnt Dstrct Attney  Septemr 5 2000 On My 12 2006 wn  ws fred Levn ws  t ge  sxty nd  leved tht  ws fred due   ge nd gender He ws replced   femle ttney n r thrtes Levn sued t stte  Illnos t Illnos Attney Generl Ls Mdgn n  r ndvdul nd fcl cpctes nd f otr Attney Generl employees  t Age Dscrmnt Employnt Act (ADEA) t Cvl Rghts Act  1964 nd t Equl Protect Cluse  t Fteenth Andnt T defendnts moved  dsmss t sut  rgung tht etr t clm  t ADEA precluded t Cvl Rghts Act clm  tht ty re enttled  qulfed mmunty  t ADEA T dstrct ct gnlly ruled tht t ADEA  not prevent t clm  proceedng  t Cvl Rghts Act nd grnted t qulfed mmunty After t cse ws ressgned   dfferent dstrct ct judge t dstrct ct ld tht Levn ws not n employee  t purpose  t Cvl Rghts Act nd t ADEA    not pursue  clms nd tht t defendnts re not enttled  qulfed mmunty T US Ct  Appels  t Seventh Crcut ffrd

On Jnury 25 1997  sxteen-yer-old grl ws kdnpped murdered nd rped After n nvestgt t polce rrested Rt Woodll  subsequently pled gulty  cptl murder cptl kdnppng nd frst-degree rpe At trl Woodll nvoked  Ffth Andnt rght  vod self-ncrmnt nd declned  testfy nd   sked t judge  nstruct t jury not  mke ny dverse nferences  tht decs T judge refused  ssue t "no dverse nference" nstruct nd stted tht  enterng  gulty ple Woodll wved  rght   free  self-ncrmnt T jury found Woodll gulty  ll chrges nd t judge sentenced   t deth penlty nd two subsequent lfe sentences
Woodll ppeled  t Kentucky Sre Ct whch ffrd  Woodll's cvct nd sentence In 2006 Woodll fled  hus cpus pett n federl ct nd tht ct ld tht t trl ct volted Woodll's Ffth Andnt rght wn t refused  fer t requested jury nstruct In ddt tht ct l ld tht Woodll's Ffth Eghth nd Fteenth Andnt rghts re volted wn t trl ct llod t stte  dsmss n Afrcn-Arcn jur wth  mndty rng  cuse On ppel t US Ct  Appels  t Sxth Crcut ffrd t dstrct ct's decs  t ssue  self-ncrmnt   not ddress t otr ssues

T Ntl Lb Relts Act (NLRA) estblsd t Ntl Lb Relts Bd (Bd)  decde lb dsputes mg employers uns nd employees Prtes frst fle unfr lb prctce llegts   Regl Offce whch tn cducts n nvestgt nd f necessry fles  complnt An Admnstrtve Lw Judge (ALJ) presdes  t rng  t complnt nd ssues  recomndt  t Bd Unless  prty  t dspute fles  tly ppel t ALJ's recomndt cos t fnl der  t Bd To r  cse nd ssue  rulng t Bd must hve t lest three  ts fve mrs present T NLRA llows prtes  ppel  Bd rulng  t US Ct  Appels  t re wre t lleged unfr lb prctce occurred   t US Ct  Appels  t Dstrct  Columb Crcut Bd mrs re ppted  t presdent nd serve fve-yer terms
In 2010 Noel Cnnng  bottler nd dstr  Peps-Col products ws engged n negotts wth ts employee un t Interntl Brotrhood  Temsters Locl 760 (Un) Durng t fnl brgnng sess tht Decemr Noel Cnnng greed  submt two wge nd pens plns   vote  t Un mrshp T mrshp pproved t un's preferred proposl Hover Noel Cnnng rgued tht t dscusss  not mount   bndng greent nd refused  ncpte t chnges n  new collectve brgnng greent T Un fled  complnt wth t Bd llegng tht Noel Cnnng's cts csttuted n unfr lb prctce n volt  t NLRA An ALJ determned tht t greent ws bndng nd dered Noel Cnnng  sgn t collectve brgnng greent T Bd ffrd t rulng gnst Noel Cnnng
Noel Cnnng ppeled  t US Ct  Appels  t Dstrct  Columb Crcut whch ld tht t Bd's rulng ws nvld cuse not enough mrs  t Bd re present T pnel tht rd t Noel Cnnng cse cssted  e mr  ws ppted  Presdent Brck Obm nd cfrd  t Sente n 2010 nd two mrs m Presdent Obm ppted wth Sente cfrmt n Jnury 2012 Although t Recess Apptnts Cluse llows t presdent  fll vcnces tht occur whle Cgress s n recess ten Decemr 2011 nd t end  Jnury 2012 t Sente t n pro m etngs e three busness dys Tree t Ct  Appels determned tht t Sente ws not n recess  t dys t Sente  not et cuse  t purpose  t Recess Apptnts Cluse recess s defned s t t n ten sesss  Cgress
case_name: National Labor Relations Board v. Noel Canning

In 1995 Cgress encted t Prvte Securtes Ltgt Rem Act (PSLRA) whch ws nt  combt ssues  s nusnce flngs trgetng  specfc clents nd clent mnpult n clss ct suts To prevent plntffs  flng clss ct suts n stte cts n der  get round t restrcts  PSLRA Cgress encted t Securtes Ltgt Unm Stndrds Act (SLUSA) whch provded  t dsmssl  removl   clss ct sut br   thn 50 plntffs n cnect wth  "ced securty" T term "ced securty" ws lmted   subset  securtes tht re trded   ntl exchnge  ssued   federlly regstered nvestnt compny
In 2009 t Securtes nd Exchnge Commss (SEC) sued t Stnd Gro Compny nd otr holdngs  R Allen Stnd  llegedly perpetrtng  mssve Pz sc Two gros  Lousn nvests l sued Stnd holdngs  tr roles n t Pz sc nd  volts  t Lousn Securtes Act Tse cses re cldted wth two otrs gnst Stnd holdngs nd moved  t dstrct ct  t Ntrn Dstrct  Texs T defendnts moved  dsmss t complnts  SLUSA nd rgued tht t ct  pt n expnsve nterprett  "ced securtes" T dstrct ct ld tht t funds re not ced securtes  t grnted t dsmssl cuse t funds re represented s ced securtes nd cuse t ws lkely tht t lest e  t plntffs lqudted  retrent ccount whch  ced securty n der  purchse t funds n quest T US Ct  Appels  t Ffth Crcut reversed nd ld tht tre ws not  suffcent cnect ten t msrepresentt nd t sck sle  csder tm cnected nd  t securtes  funct s "ced"  t purposes   SLUSA dsmssl

In 1999 Gry Woods nd Blly McCombs c nvests n two prtnershps Those prtnershps tn trnsferred tr ssets   cpt tht ws jtly ed  Woods nd McCombs whch cused t prtnershps   csdered lqudted  tx purposes Becuse t vlue   lqudted sset s equl  t prtner's bss n t nvestnt t prtnershps repted tr losses  tr tx repts s equl  t purchsed opts Woods' nd McCombs' seprte compnes gnlly ctred  t prtnershps After cductng n udt t Internl Revenue Servce (IRS) determned tht t prtnershp trnscts served no busness purpose nd re lely  t purpose  tx vodnce Tree ty hd no legl bss nd t IRS  not csder t prtnershps vld T IRS mposed ccurcy-relted penltes  sttents  nco nd gross vlut mssttents
In 2005 Woods (s t tx mtters representtve  t prtnershp) br t mtter e  dstrct ct nd rgued tht penltes re npproprte cuse t tx csequences  t trnscts re ccurtely repted T dstrct ct ld tht t trnscts "lcked ecomc substnce" nd tht tr repted losses   dsregrded T ct l ld tht cuse t trnscts hd no ecomc substnce t vlut mssttent penltes  not pply T Unted Sttes ppeled t decs wth regrd  t vlut mssttent penltes nd t US Ct  Appels  t Ffth Crcut ffrd t lor ct's rulng

T county srff lter determned tht t shotgun ws ld b eghteen ncs  Wllm's body wth t sck wrd t feet nd t brrel lg t body wn t ws fred He l determned tht t gun lkely  not fre   pers jrrng poundng  droppng t lthough tre ws l evdence tht t gun hd occslly dschrged ccdentlly n t pst Dr Vetch t county cer found notr wound n Wllm's cst  determned tht t ws t wound  Wllm's d tht cused  mdte deth; t cst wound lkely ly resulted n  gret del  pn Dr Vetch  ws l Wllm's persl physcn testfed tht Wllm hd mld  moderte n-specfc prosttts whch left  tred   not prevent   ng frm wk Wllm  not pprently leve  sucde note  nt sucde   reltves  frends In cnect wth Blnc's lter clm  nefts ever Dr Vetch lsted t cuse  deth s “sucde”

In 1956 t Attney Generl  Albm John M Ptters fled sut gnst t NAACP  New Yk cpt dvoctng  equl rghts  blck Arcns He fled t ct s n ttempt  oust t sct  t stte T clm lleged tht t NAACP fled  comply wth Albm sttutes requrng egn cpts  regster wth t Albm Secretry  Stte lg wth otr cts  clerly relted  t NAACP’s poltcl mss Tht s dy t Attney Generl obtned  restrnng der brrng t NAACP  cductng busness n t stte  ttemptng  comply wth t sttuty requrents n quest Bee t cse ws rd  t rts t ct found t NAACP   n ctempt n prt  flng  comply wth  ct der requrng t NAACP  produce recds
T Sre Ct  Albm dsmssed t NAACP’s pett   wrt  certr On ppel t Sre Ct  t Unted Sttes ld tht requrng t NAACP  produce recds ncludng ns nd ddresses  ts mrs ws  volt   mrs’ freem  sct T Sre Ct  Albm ever gn ffrd t judgnt  ctempt rgung tht t Sre Ct’s judgnt rested  t mstken premse tht Albm hd ncrectly nterpreted ts  procedurl rules T Sre Ct  t Unted Sttes gn remnded t cse n  per curm opn holdng tht t NAACP hd stsfed t dstrct ct’s der even though t NAACP  not produce t mrshp lsts

In t lte 1990s two presss t t Msschusetts Insttute  Technology (MIT) Tom Leght nd Dnel Lewn gn  reserch technques  provde stble nternet servces  perods  hgh trffc Tse n eventully founded Akm Technologes Inc (Akm)  cptlze  t reserch Akm s n nternet ctent del compny tht s nd mntns thousnds  servers round t Unted Sttes nd ctrcts wth nternet servce provders By ctrctng wth tse compnes Akm cn delver stble fst nternet  fr-rechng custs wth less dnger  nternet slowwn  flure On July 14 1998 t two n fled  ptent  MIT   thod desgned  llevte Internet cgest  delverng ctent  multple vlble servers MIT tn lcensed t ptent  Akm

On Mrch 23 2010  polce fcer pprocd Isrel Lej Jr t  drve-n resturnt wth  wrrnt   rrest Lej proceeded  led t polce   hgh-speed chse  t nterstte whle perodclly cllng t polce dsptcr syng tht  hd  gun nd thretenng  shoot t fcers chsng  T fcers ctnued tr pursut nd otr fcers deployed spke strps Trooper Chdrn Lee Mullenx  lernng tht otr spke strps re set  decded  pursue t lternte tctc  shootng t Lej’s cr n der  sp t Although  hd not receved trnng  t mneuver  nd e  t fcers n pursut   pln nd rdoed  servs  permss Bee recevng  respse Mullenx got n post  n pss Wtnesses testfed tht Mullenx  r  servs respd  sy tht   “stnd ” nd “see f t spkes wk frst” Wn Lej’s cr pprocd Mullenx fred sx shots T cr struck t spke strps ht t dn nd rolled severl ts It ws lter determned tht Lej ded s  result  Mullenx’ shots f  whch struck  body nd ne  whch struck t cr’s rdt hood  engne block
T respdents sued Mullenx  42 USC §1983 nd rgued tht Mullenx hd volted Lej’s Fth Andnt rghts  usng excessve ce gnst  Mullenx moved  summry judgnt nd rgued tht  ws enttled  qulfed mmunty T dstrct ct dened t mot nd ld tht tre re genune quests  fct regrdng wtr Mullenx cted s  resble fcer  hve  smlr crcumstnces T US Ct  Appels  t Ffth Crcut ffrd nd subsequently dened Mullenx’s pett   rerng

In July 1995 Dune Edwrd Buck ws rrested  t murder   ex-grlfrend Debr Grdner nd r frend Kenneth Butler Buck ws cvcted  cptl murder    t deths Durng t penlty phse  trl t prosecut presented evdence  Buck’s future dngerousness bsed   crmnl ty  cduct nd  de e nd fter rrest T defense presented t testmy   clncl psychologst  evlute t rsk  future dngerousness Tht expert stted tht  csdered demogrphc fcts ncludng rce n  nlyss nd tht sttstclly mtes re represented n t crmnl justce system On cross-exmnt t prosecut clrfed tht t expert’s opn ws tht t rce fct “blck” ncresed t lkelhood  future dngerousness T jury found tht tre ws suffcent evdence  Buck’s future dngerousness wth ny suffcent mtgtng fcts  justfy  lfe sentence  t jury sentenced Buck  deth T Texs Ct  Crmnl Appels ffrd t cvct nd sentence

textdata: Jevc Trnsptt Inc ws  truckng compny dqurtered n New Jersey tht n 2006 ws purchsed   subsdry  Sun Cptl Prtners In 2008 Jevc fled  bnkrtcy  Chpter 11  t Bnkrtcy Code; t tht pt t od b $53 mll  ts frst-prty se secured credts nd b $20 mll  ts tx nd generl unsecured credts Two lwsuts ensued n bnkrtcy ct: e ws t truck drvers sung Jevc  voltng federl nd stte Wker Adjustnt nd Retrnng Notfct Acts whch requred 60 dys’ notce  wkers e ty re ld f nd t otr ws  frudulent cveynce ct  hlf  t unsecured credts In Mrch 2012 t prtes  t frudulent cveynce ct negotted  structured dsmssl settlent tht dsposed  mny  t clms  left  t drvers T drvers objected  t settlent cuse t dstred property  credts  lor prty thn t drvers ccdng  t prtes estblsd n t Bnkrtcy Code T bnkrtcy ct rejected t objects nd pproved t proposed settlent T federl dstrct ct nd t US Ct  Appels  t Thrd Crcut ffrd nd ld tht t bnkrtcy ct hd t dscret  pprove  settlent sc sde  t Chpter 11 proceedngs tht  not comply wth t Bnkrtcy Code’s dstr sc

Lus Rm Mles-Sntn ws bn n 1962 n t Domncn Republc   ftr  hd co n Arcn ctzen n 1917 nd  motr  ws  ctzen  t Domncn Republc At t t Mles-Sntn’s prents re unmrred nd wn ty mrred n 1970 Mles-Sntn ws “legtmted”   ftr’s ctzenshp nd  c  lwful permnent resdent n 1975 Under t Immgrt nd Ntlty Act n effect t t t  Mles-Sntn’s brth  chld bn brod  n und ctzen ftr nd  n-ctzen motr ly hd ctzenshp t brth f t ctzen ftr ws physclly present n t Unted Sttes  e  ts possesss   perod tllng ten yers t  pt pr  t chld’s brth nd t lest fve   yers hd   fter t ge  14 Becuse Mles-Sntn’s ftr ws ly physclly present n Puer Rco untl 20 dys e  19th brthdy wn  left  wk n t Domncn Republc   not et t requrents  trnsfer dervtve ctzenshp  Mles-Sntn   brth
In 2000 Mles-Sntn ws plced n removl proceedngs cuse  hd en cvcted  vrous feles He ppled  hve t removl wthld nd rgued tht  hd dervtve ctzenshp   ftr  t mmgrt judge dened t pplct Mles-Sntn fled  mot  reopen nd rgued tht t denl  dervtve ctzenshp volted t Equl Protect Cluse  t Ffth Andnt Although  ftr  not stsfy t requrents  und ctzen ftrs  trnsfer dervtve ctzenshp   et t less strngent requrents  und ctzen motrs (whch requred physcl presence n t Unted Sttes  e  ts possesss  t lest  yer t  pt pr  t chld’s brth) nd t gender-bsed dfference ws  volt  Equl Protect T Bureu  Immgrt Appels dened t mot  reopen  t US Ct  Appels  t Secd Crcut reversed nd ld tht t gender-bsed dfference n t physcl presence requrent volted t Equl Protect Cluse  t Ffth Andnt

In 2003 Leroy Dn Brry nd Suznne Heger re njured wn e  t tres  tr motho fled whle ty re drvng  t hghwy whch cused t motho  srve f t rod nd turn T tre ws mnufctured  T Goodyer Tre ∓ Rubr Compny (Goodyer) In 2005 t Hegers sued Goodyer whch ws represented  Bsl J Musnuff  ll cses nvolvng tht prtculr model  tre nd  Gre Hncock s locl counsel T prtes recd  settlent wth gg  trl n 2010
Over  yer lter t Hegers’ ttney sw n rtcle tht ndcted tht Goodyer hd ne testng  t tre n quest tht hd not en provded  t Hegers  dscy T ttney fled  mot  sncts wth t dstrct ct nd rgued tht Goodyer hd commtted dscy frud  kngly ccelng crucl tests Goodyer opposed t mot nd rgued tht t hd never represented tht t provded ll t test recds tht hd en cducted  t tre t ssue T dstrct ct determned tht Goodyer nd Musnuff hd delrtely tred  frustrte ttempts  relve t cse  ts rts T dstrct ct l determned tht whle t  not mpose sncts cuse t mtter ws settled t  wrd t plntffs ttney’s fees  ll costs ncurred fter Goodyer’s respses  t frst dscy request whch c  pproxmtely $27 mll Musnuff nd Goodyer re ld jtly respsble  80%  t fgure nd Hncock  t otr 20% Musnuff nd Goodyer ppeled nd rgued tht t dstrct ct  not mpose  sncts wth t ddtl procedurl protects requred  t mpost  puntve sncts T US Ct  Appels  t Nnth Crcut ld n  ppels tht t dstrct ct hd not bused ts dscret nd ffrd t wrd  snct fees

T cty  Mm sued Bnk  Arc Cpt nd smlr defendnts  t Federl Housng Act (FHA) nd rgued tht t bnks engged n predty lendng prctces tht trgeted mtes  hgr-rsk ls whch resulted n hgh rtes  defult nd cused fnncl hrm  t cty Mm l lleged tht t bnks unjustly enrcd tmselves  tkng dvntge  nefts cferred  t cty tht tr cts dened t cty  expected property nd tx revenues nd cost t cty mey tht t  not hve hd  py hd t bnks not engged n tse predty lendng prctces T dstrct ct dsmssed t FHA clms nd ld tht Mm  not fll wthn t “ze  nterests” t sttute ws nt  protect nd tree  not hve stndng  sue  t FHA T dstrct ct l ld tht Mm hd not dequtely sn tht t bnks’ cduct ws t proxmte cuse  t hrm t cty cld  hve suffered T US Ct  Appels  t Eleventh Crcut reversed nd ld tht s lg s t plntffs n n FHA cse  hve stndng  sue  Artcle III  t Csttut ty cn sue  t FHA; t sttuty stndng requrent s not  nrrow thn Artcle III T ppellte ct l determned tht Mm hd suffcently sn tht t bnks’ cts re t proxmte cuse  t hrm cuse t hrm ws resbly eseeble s  csequence  t cts

Endrew F s n utstc ffth grde student  ws plced n prvte school cuse  prents leved  publc school educt ws ndequte Endrew ws plced n Frefly Autsm House nd  prents sued  rembursent  Endrew’s prvte school tut nd relted expenses pursunt  t Indvduls wth Dsbltes Act (IDEA) IDEA provdes tht f  free publc school cnnot et t eductl needs   dsbled student t student’s prents  enroll tr chld n  prvte school nd seek rembursent  tut nd relted expenses
T cse frst nt  n Admnstrtve Lw Judge (ALJ)  revew T ALJ rejected Endrew’s prent’s request  rembursent ccludng tht Endrew’s publc school hd provded  wth “free pproprte publc educt” (FAPE) s requred  t IDEA T dstrct ct ffrd t ALJ’s rulng nd ld tht Endrew’s prents fled  et tr burden  prove tht Endrew ws not provded wth FAPE T US Ct  Appels  t Tenth Crcut ffrd

Js Grc D  ntve nd ctzen  t Phlppnes ws dmtted  t Unted Sttes s  lwful permnent resdent n 1992 In 2007 nd 2009 D ws cvcted  t Cln Penl Code  frst-degree resdentl burglry;  cvcts resulted n two yers’ mprsnt Under t Immgrt nd Ntlty Act (INA)  n-ctzen cvcted  n ggrvted fely s subject  deptt T INA defnt  ggrvted fely ncludes  “cr  volence” whch s ny fense tht nvolves t use  substntl rsk  physcl ce gnst notr pers  propertyT Deprtnt  Holnd Securty (DHS) subsequently ntted deptt proceedngs gnst D nd cld tht  burglry cvcts csttuted crs  volence  t Act T Immgrt Judge ld tht D ws deptble nd tht burglry csttutes  cr  volence cuse t lwys nvolves  rsk  physcl volence T Bd  Immgrt Appels (BIA) ffrd
Whle D’s ppel  t US Ct  Appels  t Nnth Crcut ws pendng t US Sre Ct decded Johns v Unted Sttes whch ld  tht t defnt   “volent fely” n t Ard Creer Crmnl Act (ACCA) ws uncsttutlly vgue As  result t US Ct  Appels  t Nnth Crcut ld tht t INA’s cr  volence provs ws uncsttutlly vgue cuse t ws lrgely smlr  t volent fely provs n t ACCA tht t Sre Ct struck wn n Johns T ppellte ct found tht  provss dened fr notce  defendnts nd fled  mke cler wn  rsk  volence   csdered substntl

textdata: Dmn Ocho fled  chrge wth t Equl Employnt Opptunty Commss (EEOC) gnst r r employer McLne Compny (McLne)  voltng Ttle VII  t Cvl Rghts Act  1964 McLne requred ll new employees nd employees returnng wk fter  dcl leve  tke  physcl cpblty strength test  posts tht re clssfed s physclly demndng Ocho fled t test three ts nd tree r employnt ws termnted T EEOC opened  n nvestgt n McLne Co Durng t nvestgt t EEOC ssued  subpoen  nmt McLne wthld ncludng etr “pedgree nmt”  ech test-tker  ress t test-tker’s employnt ws termnted McLne ctnued  refuse  provde tht nmt  t EEOC fled  subpoen encent ct T dstrct ct requred McLne  dsclose   t nmt t EEOC subpoened  t refused  requre McLne  dvulge t “pedgree nmt”  ress  termnt T US Ct  Appels  t Nnth Crcut reversed n prt nd vcted n prt fter revewng t lor ct’s decs “de novo”  wth gvng deference  t lor ct’s determnt

In 1987 t US Sre Ct decded n Booth v Mrylnd tht t Eghth Andnt prohbts  sentencng jury n  deth penlty cse  csderng vctm mpct evdence tht es not drectly relte  t crcumstnces  t cr In Pyne v Tennessee f yers lter t Sre Ct determned tht t bn ly ppled  vctm mpct testmy Becuse Pyne  not del wth t vctm’s fmly mr’s chrcterzts  t defendnt t cr  t sentence s Booth hd t Pyne Ct  not ddress tse types  evdence
Shun Mcl Bosse ws cvcted  three counts  frst-degree murder  kllng Ktrn Grffn nd r two chldren T prosecut s t deth penlty nd  Bosse’s object sked three  t vctms’ fmly mrs  recomnd  sentence  t jury All three recomnded t deth penlty nd t jury sentenced Bosse  deth Bosse ppeled nd rgued tht t sentencng process hd volted t US Sre Ct’s decs n Booth T Oklhom Ct  Crmnl Appels ffrd t sentence nd ld tht Pyne hd “mplctly ruled” Booth s t relted  chrcterzts  t defendnt nd opns b t sentence

T New Yk Generl Busness Lw prohbts surchrges  credt crd trnscts Expresss Hr Desgn lg wth f otr New Yk busnesses nd tr ers sued Erc T Schnedermn t Attney Generl  New Yk s ll s t Dstrct Attneys  New Yk County nd rgued  tht t sttute volted t Free Speech Cluse  t Frst Andnt nd tht t sttute ws uncsttutlly vgue  t Due Process Cluse  t Fteenth Andnt T dstrct ct ld tht t sttute ws uncsttutl   tes T dstrct ct found tht t sttute mpermssbly dstngusd ten surchrges nd dscounts whch nrrod t m  comrcl speech vlble  t plntffs nd volted t Frst Andnt Addtlly t sttute ws vgue cuse ts pplct depended entrely  t lls plntffs used T US Ct  Appels  t Secd Crcut reversed nd ld tht t sttute qulfed s permssble regult  ecomc ctvty T ppellte ct determned  tht prces re not nrently protected speech nd tht cuse t surchrge provs hd n esly sod nng t provs ws not uncsttutlly vgue

Lev Den Jr nd Jml Den re brotrs  greed  prtcpte n  robry   locl drug deler kn s JR wth Jessc Cbll nd Srh Berg On Aprl 15 2013 Lev nd Jml ccompned Berg  t Plr House Motel n Soux Cty Iow  cfrt JR Jml pulled  gun  JR nd ht   t d wth t frerm Berg Jml nd Lev fled t scene wth JR’s cr cell phe nd thmptmnes Lter tht mth Lev nd Jml robd notr thmptmne deler CB t gunpt n  ho In  smlr mnner Jml ht CB wth  gun nd fled t scene n CB’s cr wth $300 thmptmnes nd otr electrcs Durng t robry t Dens dered Hope Mrsh  ws lvng t t resdence  co wth nd lve wth tm T Dens re eventully rrested n My  2013 
T Dens re cvcted  multple crs ncludng robry n volt  t Hobbs Act whch requres tht  cr  “obstruct dely  ffect comrce” Lev Den Jr ws sentenced  400 mths ncludng  360-mth mndty mnmum csecutve sentence pursunt  t sentence  possess   frerm n nce   volent cr  18 USC §924(c)  Wth t mndty mnmum Lev’s sentence gudelne  hve en 84-105 mths On ppel Lev Den chllenged t suffcency t evdence  estblsh  nexus  nterstte comrce s t Hobbs Act requres t suffcency  evdence   frerm cvcts nd t resbleness   sentence T US Ct  Appels  t Eghth Crcut ld t dstrct ct’s decs  follow t precedent t estblsd n Unted Sttes v Htcr whch ld tht t dstrct ct  not hve dscret  recsder mndty mnmums n sentences T ppellte ct ld tht t dstrct ct’s sentence  40-mths   served csecutvely wth t 360-mth sentence ws “substntvely resble nd not n buse  t dstrct ct’s dscret”

On June 7 2010 Sergo Adrn Hernndez Guerec  ffteen-yer-old Mexcn ntl ws plyng wth frends  t cent culvert  t Ro Grnde tht seprtes El P Texs  Jurez Mexco Hernndez nd  frends ok turns runnng  t nclne  t culvert  uch t brd-wre fence  t US sde  t nd tn runnng bck wn t nclne  t Mexcn sde Jesus Mes Jr  US Bder Ptrol Agent rrved  t scene nd detned e  Hernndez’s frends t t US bder whle Hernndez retreted  t Mexcn sde  t Rver nd hd hnd t pllrs  t P del Nte brdge Mes stll stndng  t US sde  t bder fred t lest two shots t Hernndez e  whch struck  n t d nd klled 
Sx mths fter Hernndez’s deth  prents sued Mes n federl dstrct ct n Texs nd lleged tht Mes volted t Fth nd Ffth Andnts  t US Csttut  t use  dedly ce nd t flure  use  resble ce wn mkng rrests Mes moved  dsmss nd rgued tht Hernndez lcked csttutl protect cuse  ws n len wth voluntry ttchnts  t Unted Sttes  ws stndng n Mexco wn  ws klled Applyng  mlst test t dstrct ct ccluded tht t Csttut’s dedly-ce protects sp t t bder  n-ctzens lke Hernndez T US Ct  Appels  t Ffth Crcut ffrd n prt nd reversed n prt nd ld tht t Ffth Andnt protects gnst dedly ce ppled  not t Fth Andnt protects T ppellte ct l ld tht Mes ws not enttled  qulfed mmunty Rerng t cse en bnc t ppellte declned  nsr t Ffth Andnt quest  ld tht Mes ws enttled  qulfed mmunty nd tht Hernndez  not ssert  clm  t Fth Andnt cuse  ws  Mexcn ctzen wth  sgnfcnt voluntry cnect  t Unted Sttes  ws  Mexcn l wn  ws shot nd klled

Olve Clrk nd Joe Wellner re  resdents t t Fountn Crcle Cre nd Rehbltt Center  nursng ho operted  Kndred Nursng Centers Lmted Prtnershp (Kndred Nursng) n Wncster Kentucky Pr  tr dmss  t fclty ech hd desgnted tr reltves s ttneys-n-fct whch gve t reltves brod uthty  enter n trnscts nd greents  tr hlf Tr reltves Jns E Clrk nd Beverly Wellner used tr sttus s ttneys-n-fct  sgn n lterntve dspute relut greents wth t fclty tht stpulted tht ny dsputes rsng  t Olve’s nd Joe’s stys t t fclty   relved  rbtrt 
 
Olve nd Joe  pssed wy n t sprng  2009 nd Jns nd Beverly ech fled lwsuts gnst Kndred Nursng  persl njury nd wrgful deth  tr hlf Kndred Nursng moved  compel rbtrt bsed  t greents tht Jns nd Beverly hd sgned T stte trl ct ntlly dsmssed  judcl cts n fv  rbtrt  lter reversed n ccdnce wth t precedent t Sre Ct  Kentucky estblsd n Png v Beverly Enterprses Inc In tht cse t Sre Ct  Kentucky ld tht t por  ttney tht uthzed n ttney-n-fct  mnge t prncpl’s “fnncl ffrs” nd “lth-cre decss”  not nclude t uthty  bnd t prncpl  n optl rbtrt greent T Sre Ct  Kentucky ffrd t lor ct’s decs

Jun Esquvel-Quntn ws dmtted  t Unted Sttes s  lwful permnent resdent n 2000 In 2009  pled gulty  unlwful sexul ntercse wth  m  t relevnt sttute n Cln In Cln unlwful sexul ntercse wth  m s defned s n ct  sexul ntercse wth  pers  s  m nd not t spouse  t perpetrt T sttute  provdes tht nye  s cvcted  unlwful sexul ntercse wth  m  s  thn three yers nger thn t perpetrt s gulty   msde   fely

In 2014 Aled Johns fled  bnkrtcy n Albm bnkrtcy ct  Chpter 13  t Bnkrtcy Code In 2003 nd yers pr Mdlnd Fundng hd purchsed  bundle  debt wth l $2000  Johns  fter s fled  bnkrtcy Mdlnd Fundng fled  pro  clm n t s ct Becuse t dte  t lst trnsct n t ccount n quest occurred n 2003 nd t sttute  lmtts  collectng unpd debt n Albm s sx yers Johns sued Mdlnd Fundng n federl dstrct ct rgued tht t Fr Debt Collect Prctces Act (FDCPA) prevented bnkrtcy cts tht hd pssed tr sttutes  lmtts
 
Mdlnd Fundng moved  dsmss nd t dstrct ct grnted t mot T dstrct ct determned determned tht whle t FDCPA prohbted t flng   pro  clm kn   brred  t sttute  lmtts t US Bnkrtcy Code llod  credt  fle  pro  clm even fter t sttute  lmtts hs run T dstrct ct relved tht cflct  holdng tht t credts’ rght  fle  clm precluded debts  chllengng tht prctce  t FDCPA Johns ppeled nd t US Ct  Appels  t Eleventh Crcut reversed nd remnded t cse T ppellte ct found tht lthough t Bnkrtcy Code llod credts  fle clms brred  t sttute  lmtts tht  not preclude tm  lblty  t FDCPA  flng t clm

Jode Nevls ws  federl employee wth  Coventry Helth Cre  Mss (Coventry) lth nsurnce pln tht ws gned  t Federl Employee Helth Benefts Act (FEHBA) whch expressly preempts stte lws nd regults gnng lth nsurnce nd nefts plns After Nevls ws wrded  settlent n  persl njury cse Coventry enced  clm  t settlent mey Nevls sued Coventry nd rgued tht Mss lw prevented nsurnce compnes  clmng t proceeds  persl njury settlents T trl ct entered summry judgnt n fv  t nsurnce compny nd ld tht t FEHBA preempted stte lw regrdng nsurnce compnes’ clms  t proceeds  persl njury settlent T Sre Ct  Mss reversed nd ld tht t FEHBA  not preempt stte lw n t cse cuse n nsurnce compny’s clm   persl njury settlent es not clerly relte  “t nture provs  extent  cge  nefts”
 
After t Sre Ct  Mss’s decs t Offce  Persnel Mngent creted  new ml rule Tht rule stted tht n nsurnce crrer’s rghts nd respsbltes wth respect  t settlent  n ndvdul ced  tht nsurnce crrer’s pln “relte  t nture provs nd extent  cge  nefts”  t purpose  t FEHBA T US Sre Ct subsequently grnted certr  t cse nd vcted nd remnded t lor ct’s decs  recsdert n lght  t new rule On remnd t Sre Ct  Mss ld tht tre s no precedent tht estblss tht  federl gency’s nterprett   preempt cluse receves judcl deference Tree t Sre Ct  Mss gn determned tht t FEHBA  not preempt Mss stte lw
case_name: Coventry Health Care of Missouri, Inc. v. Nevils
first_party: Coventry Health Care of Missouri, Inc.

Lester Pcknghm ws cvcted  tkng “ndecent lrtes” wth  m n 2002 s  21-yer-old college student Per Nth Croln lw  ws sentenced   stndrd 10-12 mth mprsnt follod   24-mth servsed relese Asde  ng ld  “remn wy ” t m  cvct entled no specl stpults Pcknghm ws rrested n 2010 fter uthtes c cross  post   Fcebook prle thnkng God  hvng  prkng tcket dsmssed He ws rrested  voltng Nth Croln’s lws regrdng cvcted sex fenders whch brred t fender’s ccess  cl d bstes 
 
In  defense Pcknghm rgued tht t lw volted  Frst Andnt rghts He ws cvcted n trl ct whch found tht t stte hd  ghty nterest n keepng sexul predts f  cl d bstes  t “protect  ms” T Nth Croln Ct  Appels reversed nd ld tht t cl d bste provs  t lw ws uncsttutl T Nth Croln Sre Ct reversed nd ld tht t lw ws csttutl  fndng tht t lw ws  “lmtt  cduct” nd not  restrct  free speech T ct found tht t stte hd  suffcent nterest n “estllng t llct lurkng nd ctct”  regstered sex fenders nd tr potentl future vctms

In Oct 2010 Deputes Chrspr Cley nd Jennfer Peders  t Los Angeles County Srff’s Deprtnt respded   tp  n nmnt tht wnted prolee Rne O’Dell hd en seen n frt  t ner resdence  Pul Hugs T fcers re nd tht Angel Mendez nd Jennfer Lynn Grc lved getr n t bckyrd  t Hugs resdence Although ty  not hve  serch wrrnt otr fcers drected Deputes Cley nd Peders  serch t bckyrd After determnng tht O’Dell ws not n ny  t three stge sds n Hugs’ bckyrd t deputes proceeded   wooden sd surrounded  n A/C unt clots locker clots nd otr lgngs T deputes  not knock nd nnounce tr presence Deputy Cley  openng t  sw t slhouette   pers holdng  rfle   curtn n t sd Cley yelled “Gun” nd  deputes proceeded  shoot Mendez nd Grc Wtr Mendez ws rely movng t gun  ws ptng t t t deputes ws subject  cflctng testmy t trl As  result Mendez requred mputt   rght leg low t knee nd Grc ws shot n t bck 
 
Mendez nd Grc sued Cley nd Peders nd lleged tht t deputes n tr fcl cpcty deprved tm  tr Fth Andnt rghts  permng n unjustfed wrrntless serch nd tht t deputes fled  dre  t knock-nd-nnounce rule whch requres tht fcers nnounce tr presence e ty enter  ho T dstrct ct found  t plntffs   tse llegts nd l ld tht lthough t fcers’ use  ce ws resble  t crcumstnces ty re lble  t shootng  t Nnth Crcut’s provoct rule Tht rule holds n fcer lble  use  dedly ce wre t fcer ntentlly  recklessly provokes  volent cfrtt v  Fth Andnt volt T US Ct  Appels  t Nnth Crcut ffrd t lor ct’s determnt tht t serch volted t Fth Andnt  reversed t knock-nd-nnounce rule holdng tht cuse tre ws no ctrollng Nnth Crcut precedent  wtr fcers must nnounce tmselves gn t  seprte resdence  t s property  T ppellte ct l ld tht t fcers re lble  t provoct rule cuse tr unjustfed serch  t occed sd led  t shootng
case_name: County of Los Angeles v. Mendez
first_party: County of Los Angeles, et al.

Mr Stplet nd t otr plntffs n t cse re  gro  employees  wk  Advocte Helth Cre Netwk (Advocte) whch opertes hosptls nptent nd ptent tretnt centers  trn Illnos nd re mrs  Advocte’s retrent pln Advocte d n 1995 s t result   rger ten two relgously fflted hosptl systems (though netr system ws ed  fnnclly operted  t church wth whch t ws fflted) Advocte s l fflted wth  church nd though t s not ed  fnnclly operted  t church t mntns ctrcts wth t church nd “ffrms [t church’s] mnstry” T plntffs n t cse sued Advocte nd rgued tht t Advocte retrent pln s subject  ERISA nd tree Advocte hs brecd ts fducry duty  flng  dre  ERISA’s requrents T defendnts moved  summry judgnt cuse t Advocte pln fell  t ERISA exempt  church plns T dstrct ct dened t mot cuse t determned tht  pln estblsd nd mntned   church-fflted gnzt ws not  church pln wthn t nng  t sttuty lnguge T US Ct  Appels  t Seventh Crcut ffrd nd t cse ws cldted wth two otr es presentng t s ssue e t Sre Ct

Terry Heycutt ws  slred employee  wked t Brnerd Ar Ste whch ws ed   brotr Ty Heycutt In 2008 wn Terry notced n ncrese n t numr  “edgy lookng” people purchsng Polr Pure n odne-bsed wter purfct product  clled t locl polce stt  fnd  f tre ws nythng   know b t T polce cfrd Terry’s suspc tht Polr Pure ws ng used  mnufcture thmptmne nd tht  n’t sell t f  felt uncomtble Brnerd Ar Ste ws t ly plce tht ld Polr Pure loclly nd t product ws kept hnd t counter  ly t Heycutt brotrs ld t Over t cse  t next yer t Heycutt brotrs ld ncresng mounts  Polr Pure T Drug Encent Admnstrt gn nvestgtng t brotrs nd t ste whch culmnted n  serch wrrnt n 2010 T serch wrrnt reveled tht Polr Pure ws t ste’s hgst grossng tem nd tht t generted $260000  prt After t DEA gents sezed t ste’s nventy  Polr Pure t numr  re th lbs usng t odne thod dropped  “nsgnfcnt” levels A grnd jury ndcted  brotrs Ty pled gulty nd Terry nt  trl wre  ws cvcted  11  t 14 counts wth whch  ws chrged T jury found  gulty nd sentenced   ccurrent terms  60 mths  ech count  t jury  not der ny feture  t proceeds  t sles cuse t found tht s  slred employee Terry  not rep t proceeds  t csprcy

In 1984 t body  Ctrne Fuller ws dsced n n lley S hd clerly en bdly ten nd rped T polce re unble  rec physcl evdence tht  dentfy t perpetrts nd t dcl exmner ws unble  determne  mny people re nvolved After nvestgtng nd cductng  400 ntervews t polce developed  ty tht Fuller hd en ssulted nd klled   lrge gro  teens  hd gnlly set   rob r A tl  13 teens re ntlly ndcted nd two  tm Hrry Bennett nd Clvn Alst pled gulty nd greed  testfy  t gnnt Tse two wtnesses greed  t lne  events  dffered sgnfcntly    t detls Turner nd severl  t otr defendnts put th lb defenses    tr lbs cflcted wth ech otr T jury found Turner nd nne  t otr defendnts gulty nd tr cvcts re ffrd  drect ppel
Nerly 25 yers lter Turner nd severl  t otr gnl defendnts moved  hve tr sentences vcted nd cld tht ty hd not receved fr trls cuse t gnnt hd wthld exculpty evdence n volt  Brdy v Mrylnd whch estblsd tht t ws  volt  due process  t prosecut  spress evdence fvble  t defense tht s mterl  etr gult  punshnt Addtlly Turner nd t otr defendnts rgued tht newly dsced evdence ncludng t recntts  Bennett nd Alst estblsd tht ty re ctully nnocent  t cr T trl ct dened t mot nd t Dstrct  Columb Ct  Appels ffrd cuse Turner nd t otr r defendnts hd not sn  resble probblty tht t co  tr trls  hve en dfferent hd t gnnt dsclosed t evdence n quest nd tht t new evdence estblsd tr ctul nnocence   prepdernce  t evdence T Sre Ct cldted t cse wth notr sut  e  t otr gnl defendnts

In 2013 Sndr sued John nd cld tht s ws stll enttled   full 50%  t MRP nefts John receved regrdless   wver   pt   nefts due  dsblty Both t Arz Ser Ct nd t Arz Ct  Appels ffrd n Sndr’s fv John ppeled nd cted t Arz Sre Ct’s rulng n Mnsell v Mnsell whch ld tht t Und Servces Fr Spouses’ Protect Act (USFSPA) preempted stte cts  llg t r spouses  veterns  clm nterest n t wved pt  t vetern’s MRP T Arz Sre Ct ffrd t ppellte ct’s decs nd stted tht whle t Mnsell stndrd ws pplcble e dvce proceedngs re fnlzed nd  t proceedngs cts re splt regrdng t rules fter  dvce hd en grnted T Ct found tht cuse t lor ct  not grnt Sndr n nterest n t dsblty sum tself  rtr n nterest n John’s ll ssets n n equl sum tn Sndr ws free  requre pynt  John  mke   t losses s  suffer due   wver   pt  t nefts shred ten tm

textdata: T Clen Wter Act (CWA) provdes  judcl revew n nstnces wre t Envrntl Protect Agency’s ct results n t ssunce  denl  ny permt  plces restrcts  wste emsss  otr ctvtes relted  t wtersOn August 28 2015  fnl rule ssued  t Envrntl Protect Agency nd US Ar Cps  Engneers tht defned t scope  “t wters  t Unted Sttes”  t CWA c n effect Nurous sttes nd otr gnzts chllenged t vldty  t gences’ rule nd ctended  tht t  not cm wth t CWA nd ws mproperly pted n volt  t requrents  t Admnstrtve Procedures Act Follg cldt  t clms e t US Ct  Appels  t Sxth Crcut t Ntl Asct  Mnufcturers ntervened  j t plntffs nd moved  dsmss T plntffs rgued tht t CWA es not provde t federl crcut cts wth jursdct  t gences’ rule nd tht revew s properly ld n t dstrct cts nsted T ppellte ct ld tht t hd jursdct cuse lthough t rule ly defned t scope  US wters  defnng ts boundres t rule functlly plced restrcts  ctvty relted  t wters Tree t rule ffected permttng requrents nd thus hd t prctcl effect  grntng  denyng permts

textdata: On August 10 2003 Germne Rucker ws shot nd klled Kentel Myre Wever lter dmtted  shootng Rucker fter t polce quested  Durng jury select  Wever’s trl t ct fcer closed t ct  Wever’s fmly nd otr mrs  t publc due  crowdng Wever ws subsequently cvcted  murder n t frst degree In 2011 Wever fled  mot   new trl nd cld tht  ws dened effectve ssstnce  counsel cuse  counsel fled  object  t closure  t ctroom n volt   Sxth Andnt rght   publc trlT trl ct dened Wever’s mot On drect ppel t Sre Judcl Ct  Msschusetts ffrd Wever’s cvct T ct ld tht Wever hd not sn tht  suffered prejudce   counsel’s flure  object  t ct closure Although  Sxth Andnt volt typclly csttutes  “structurl err” whch s umtclly presud   prejudcl t ct ld tht wn t structurl err resulted  lleged neffectve ssstnce  counsel t defendnt must s tht  suffered prejudce

T Bologcs Prce Compett nd Innovt Act  2009 estblsd  process  t Food nd Drug Admnstrt (FDA)  lcense “bosmlr” products: products tht re “hghly smlr”  lredy-pproved bologcl products Under t Act bosmlr product pplcnts must provde notce  t seller  t gnl product t lest 180 dys pr  t frst comrcl mrketng  t bosmlr product T Act l requres t bosmlr seller  provde t gnl seller wth t detls  ts pplct wthn 20 dys  recevng notce  FDA revew
In My 2014 Snz Inc fled n pplct  FDA pprovl  ts product Zrxo whch ws hghly smlr  Amgen Inc’s product Neogen ( products re be mrrow stmulnts) On July 7 2014 t FDA notfed Snz tht ts pplct ws  revew nd t next dy Snz notfed Amgen  t pplct Lter tht mth Snz nd Amgen tht t  not dsclose t detls  ts pplct s requred  t Act On Mrch 6 2015 t FDA pproved Snz’s pplct; Snz tn notfed Amgen  t FDA’s pprovl
In Oct 2014 Amgen sued Snz nd cld tht Snz volted t Act cuse t fled  dsclose t detls  ts pplct nd  not gve proper notce  comrcl mrketng e t FDA’s pprovl  ts bosmlr product T dstrct ct ld tht flure  dsclose pplct detls  t Act es not uthze t gnl seller  receve dmges  t bosmlr product seller  prevent t sle  t bosmlr product T ct l ld tht n pplcnt  gve notce  comrcl mrketng e FDA pprovl T US Ct  Appels  t Federl Crcut vcted t dstrct ct’s rulng nd ld tht effectve notce  ly  gven fter t FDA hs pproved t pplct Tree Snz’s notce ws effectve n Mrch 2015 rtr thn July 2014 nd Snz  not sell ts bosmlr product untl 180 dys fter t Mrch 2015 notce T ct l ld tht cuse t Act ly permts redes bsed  ptent nfrngent clms Snz’s flure  dsclose t detls  ts pplct  not volte t Act Both prtes fled petts  wrts  certr whch re grnted nd cldted

On Oct 7 2007 Mslenjk’s husbnd Rtko ws cvcted  two counts  mkng flse sttents   gnnt cunt   flure  dsclose tht  hd n fct served s n fcer n  Serbn mltry unt To vod deptt Rtko ppled  sylum Testfyng   hlf t t sylum rng Mslenjk dmtted tht Rtko hd served n t Serbn mlt nd tht s hd led  t mmgrt fcer  t refugee pplct ntervew n 1998 Mslenjk ws subsequently chrged wth two counts  nturlzt frud  denyng hvng ever gven flse  msledng nmt   US fcl At trl t jury ws nstructed tht n der  fnd Mslenjk gulty  frudulently obtnng r nturlzt t need not fnd tht r flse sttents re mterl  t decs  pprove r nturlzt rely tht s mde tm kng tr flsehood Mslenjk ws cvcted   counts sentenced  two yers probt nd strpped  r ctzenshp T US Ct  Appels  t Sxth Crcut ffrd r cvct nd ld tht pro   mterl flse sttent ws not  requred elent  nturlzt frud

In 2004 McWllms fled  pett   wrt  hs cpus n federl dstrct ct T dstrct ct dened t pett wth ddressng ll  t specfc clms e  whch ncluded  clm tht  ws dened  due process rghts  t Sre Ct’s decs n Ake v Oklhom cuse t ct  not provde  wth n ndependent psychtrc expert T US Ct  Appels  t Eleventh Crcut vcted t lor ct’s decs nd remnded t cse  t dstrct ct  ddress t specfc clms n t pett T dstrct ct gn dened t pett nd t ppellte ct ffrd t lor ct’s decs  holdng tht McWllms’ due process rghts re not volted cuse  ws provded wth  competent psychtrc expert whch t t requrent  Ake nd ny hrm tht  mght hve suffered ws not prejudcl  t co  t sentencng rng

In Mrch 2011 Rt Nels ws employed  BNSF Rlwy Co (BNSF) nd sued t compny  dmges  t Federl Employers’ Lblty Act (FELA) bsed  knee njures sustned  t cse   employnt BNSF moved  dsmss  lck  persl jursdct T lor ct grnted t mot nd Nels ppeled Brent Tyrrell l wked  BNSF nd ws llegedly exposed  crcnogens tht cused   develop ultmtely ftl kdney cncer In My 2014 Kell Tyrell t dmnstrt  Brent’s estte  sued BNSF  Brent’s hlf  FELA  dmges bsed  t njures Brent sustned  t cse   employnt BNSF fled  mot  dsmss Tyrrell’s clm  lck  persl jursdct T lor ct dened t mot nd BNSF ppeled Both cses re fled n Mtn stte ct cuse Sre Ct precedent  FELA decss llows stte cts jursdct  r FELA cses lely due  t rlrod ng busness n t um stte Hover t njures  not occur n Mtn nd BNSF s ncpted n Delwre wth ts prncpl plce  busness n Texs

On Mrch 16 2008 Metropoltn Polce Deprtnt fcers respded   nose complnt   house prty Up rrvl t fcers rd loud musc comng  t house T fcers tn entered t house nd observed prty guests ncludng Te Wes drnkng nd wtchng “scntly cld w wth mey tucked n grter lts” T prtygoers cld tht  womn clled “Pecs” ws t host  t prty nd tht s hd receved permss  t er  m Pecs ws lesng t house One prtygoer clled Pecs  t phe  n fcer snce Pecs ws not present Pecs cfrd tht s hd permss  t er  wn n fcer clled t er t er cld tht t lese hd not en executed nd tht  hd not gven permss  t prty T fcers subsequently rrested t prtygoers
Sxteen  t rrested prtygoers sued t fcers nd t Dstrct  Columb  flse rrest T dstrct ct ruled n fv  t prtygoers T US Ct  Appels  t DC Crcut ffrd nd ld  tht t fcers  not hve probble cuse  entry nd re not enttled  mmunty  lblty Probble cuse  rrest  unlwful entry  DC lw exsts wre  resble fcer ccludes  nmt kn t t t tht t rrestee knew   hve kn tht ty entered t house gnst t wll  t er T ct resed tht cuse t prtygoers leved n good fth tht t er hd gven Pecs permss  t prty ty  not hve ntended  enter unlwfully T ct l ruled tht t fcers re not enttled  mmunty cuse t ws unresble  tm  leve tht ty re not voltng t prtygoers’ clerly estblsd Fth Andnt rghts gnst flse rrest

In t md-2000s Anthy Perry gn  develop osteoposs  n der  llevte  pn nd  ensure tht   ctnue wkng  mde n nml greent wth  servs t t US Census Bureu T del llod Perry  tke breks  t dy  ctrol t sympms   osteoposs nd  mke  ny t lost  t wkdy fter hs wth no penlty On June 7 2011 Perry receved  proposed removl notce tht lleged tht  hd en pd  hs tht  hd not wked He ctested t chrges nd pted  t nml greent  nd  servs hd mde nd  unblemsd permnce recd In August 2011 Perry nd t gency entered n n greent tht requred   serve  thrty-dy suspens  retre   e Septemr 4 2012 nd  fet ny dscrmnt clms gnst t gency After servng  suspens nd retrng Perry br  pro se clm e t Mert Systems Protect Bd t federl bd tht s uthzed t r certn chllenges  federl employees  dverse employnt cts An dmnstrtve lw judge (ALJ) ntlly ruled tht t Bd lcked jursdct cuse retrents re presud   voluntry nd t Bd cnnot revew clms tht resulted n settlent wth t gency Perry ppeled  t Bd whch remnded t cse Up  revew t ALJ gn dened tht t hd jursdct nd ld tht Perry hd not suffcently sn tht  ws mproperly coerced n settlng  clms Perry ppeled  t Bd gn whch ffrd t ALJ’s rulng Perry ppeled  t US Ct  Appels  t DC Crcut whch trnsferred t cse  t US Ct  Appels  t Federl Crcut bsed   lck  proper jursdctT ppellte ct cketed t cse  grnted Perry’s mot  suspend proceedngs untl t US Sre Ct relves t jursdctl ssue  whch ct system  r t cse
