textdata: Brsl-Myers Squbb Co (BMS) s  globl phrmceutcl compny ncpted n Delwre nd dqurtered n New Yk BMS mnufctures Plvx  prescrpt drug ntended  prevent blood clottng nd mrkets nd sells t drug ntwde ncludng n Cln In ddt BMS mntns fve fces n Cln f reserch fcltes nd e gnnt ffrs fce s ll s 250 sles representtves In eght nded complnts fled wth t Sn Frncsco Ser Ct 86 Cln resdents nd 575 n-Cln resdents jed n sung BMS nd McKess Cpt  Cln-bsed Plvx dstr  ndvdul product defect clms Ech lleged serous sde effects  tr use  Plvx tht BMS hd msrepresented t drug’s sfety nd effccy nd sserted nurous Cln product lblty cuses  ct gnst BMS BMS moved  dsmss t clms  lck  persl jursdct n Cln BMS rgued tht tse clms hd no lnk  ts Cln ctvtes s t nresdent plntffs re not njured  Plvx n Cln hd not en prescrd Plvx n Cln nd hd not receved Plvx dstred  McKess  Cln Addtlly BMS  not reserch  mnufcture Plvx t ts fcltes n Cln T trl ct dened BMS’s mot nd ld tht t compny ws subject  t Cln ct’s generl jursdct cuse t hd “wde-rngng ctnuous nd systemtc ctvtes n Cln” T Cln Ct  Appel rejected t trl ct’s ssessnt tht BMS ws subject  generl jursdct n Cln  ld tht t nresdent plntffs’ clms re suffcently relted  BMS’s Cln ctvtes  spt specfc jursdct T Cln Sre Ct ffrd nd ld tht BMS’s ntwde mrketng nd dstr creted  “substntl nexus” ten t nresdent plntffs’ clms nd BMS’s ctvtes n Cln cuse t clms re bsed  t s llegedly defectve product nd msledng mrketng tht llegedly cused njury  n nd sde  Cln

In 2007 Stephne Arts ws employed  t Dstrct  Columb Deprtnt  Helth (DOH) s  code nspect S lleges tht s nd r servs developed  ctenus reltshp nd tht  sngled r   unfr tretnt n t wkplce On Aprl 17 2009 Arts ok r frst dmnstrtve step gnst DOH  flng  dscrmnt clm wth t US Equl Employnt Opptunty Commss nd whle tht clm ws pendng DOH termnted Arts’s employnt n Novemr 2010
In Decemr 2011 Arts fled  lwsut gnst t Dstrct n federl ct llegng volts  Ttle VII  t Cvl Rghts Act  1964 nd nvoked t dstrct ct’s splentl jursdct  ssert clms bsed  t Dstrct’s Wtleblor Act Flse Clms Act nd comm lw T dstrct ct grnted t Dstrct’s mot  t pledngs nd dsmssed Arts’s le federl clm volt  Ttle VII s fclly defcent It thus found t hd no bss  exercse jursdct  t remnng clms
Ffty-nne dys fter r clms re dsmssed n federl ct Arts fled t remnng clms n  DC trl ct T Dstrct lleged tht Arts’s clms re t brred bsed  t respectve sttutes  lmtts nd t trl judge greed fndng tht t federl splentl jursdct sttute 28 USC § 1367(d) es not suspend stte sttutes  lmtts t t t  t unsuccessful federl flng

A Geg jury cvcted Mr Wls  mlce murder nd severl otr feles At sentencng Wls’s ttney rgued tht Wls ws not t trggermn nd presented evdence   dffcult chldhood T trl ct sentenced Wls  deth nd t Sre Ct  Geg ffrd  cvcts nd sentence  drect ppel Wls fled  stte pett   wrt  hs cpus n t Ser Ct  Butts County Geg n whch  rgued neffectve ssstnce   trl counsel n t sentencng phse   trl Hs rgunt rested  ly testmy tht  hve en used s evdence   dffcult chldhood nd expert testmy tht  hve explned  po judgnt sklls T ser ct dened t pett n  wrtten der Wls tn fled n pplct   certfcte  probble cuse  ppel whch t Geg Sre Ct summrly dened n  e-sentence der 
Wls tn fled  federl pett   wrt  hs cpus nd t dstrct ct dened  relef  t grounds tht t stte trl ct resbly ppled clerly estblsd federl lw Hover t dstrct ct grnted Wls  certfcte  ppelblty  t ssue  effectve ssstnce  counsel t sentencng A pnel  t Eleventh Crcut ffrd t dstrct ct’s decs resng tht “t e-lne decs  t Sre Ct  Geg    s t relevnt stte-ct decs   revew cuse t s t fnl decs  t rts” In  pett  rerng en bnc Wls rgued tht t pnel  hve exmned t lst resed decs   stte ct Geg gnlly rgued  federl ct  “look ”  summry der  see wtr t ws bsed  procedurl grounds  rts  tn t chnged ts post nd rgued tht t ct  look  t resed opn T Eleventh Crcut sttng en bnc ppted n mcus cure  rgue Geg’s gnl post  t mtter T Eleventh Crcut en bnc ultmtely ccluded tht federl cts  not need  “look ”  summry decs  t rts  revew t resng   lor ct

Chrmne Hr  r ntke speclst  t Housng Servces  Chcgo (NHS) nd Fnne Me’s Mtgge Help Center fled sut gnst r r employers llegng volts  t Age Dscrmnt n Employnt Act nd Ttle VII  t Cvl Rghts Act  1964 T dstrct ct grnted summry judgnt n fv  Fnne Me nd NHS  Septemr 14 2015
Under Federl Rule  Appellte Procedure 4()(1)(A) nd 28 USC Sect 2107() Hr hd untl Oct 14 2015  ppel t judgnt On Oct 8 2015 r ttney fled  mot  extend t ppel dedlne  Decemr 14 2015 whch t dstrct ct grnted Hr fled r ppel  Decemr 11 2015
In  bref requested  t ppellte ct Fnne Me nd NHS rgued tht Hr’s ppel ws untly  Rule 4()(5)(C) nd thus tht t ppellte ct lcked jursdct  t ppel Tht rule sttes tht “[n]o extens  t Rule 4()(5)  exceed 30 dys fter t prescrd t  14 dys fter t dte wn t der grntng t mot s entered whcver s lter” Hr rgued tht t rule s t odds wth 28 USC Sect 2107() whch provdes tht “t dstrct ct   mot fled not lter thn 30 dys fter t exprt  t t otrwse set  brngng ppel extend t t  ppel   sng  excusble neglect  good cuse” T ppellte ct found Hr’s rgunt unpersusve nd dsmssed r ppel  lck  jursdct

In t credt-crd ndustry tre s wht s clled  “two-sded mrket” Crdholders neft  holdng  crd ly f tht crd s ccepted   wde rnge  rchnts nd rchnts neft  cceptng  crd ly f  suffcent numr  crdholders use t Thus t crdholder nd t rchnt  depend  wdespred cceptnce   crd
In t Unted Sttes credt-crd trnsct volu s comprsed prmrly  f netwks: Vs (45%) Arcn Express (264%) MsterCrd (233%) nd Dsc (53%) Becuse  t wy Vs nd MsterCrd trnscts re hndled ty  not drectly set certn fees  rely nfluence tse prces In ctrst Arcn Express s drectly nvolved n t vst mjty  trnscts nvolvng ts crds Thus t mntns drect reltshps wth  ts crdholders nd rchnts nd drectly sets t relevnt fees

T Ntl Insttute  Fmly nd Lfe Advoctes nd two otr relgously-fflted pro-lfe enttes engged n provdng pregnncy-relted servces n t stte  Cln (collectvely “NIFLA”) s  enj t encent  t Cln Reproductve Freem Accountblty Comprensve Cre nd Trnsprency Act (t “Act”) T lw’s stted purpose s  ensure ccess  reproductve lth servces  ll Cln w regrdless  nco NIFLA rgued tht t Act’s requrents tht (1) lcensed clncs provde nmt  ptents b free nd low-cost publcly funded fmly plnnng servces ncludng ctrcept nd bt nd tht (2) unlcensed clncs nm ptents  tr unlcensed sttus volted tr free speech nd free exercse rghts  t Frst Andnt
T US Dstrct Ct  t Srn Dstrct  Cln dened NIFLA’s mot  prelmnry njunct ccludng tht ty hd not demstrted  lkelhood  success  t rts s requred  Wnter v Nturl Resces Defense Councl Inc 555 US 7 (2008) s  etr tr free speech  free exercse clms
T Nnth Crcut ffrd rulng tht t dstrct ct hd not bused ts dscret  denyng t njunct T Ct rejected NIFLA’s rgunt tht strct scrutny  pply  t Act cuse whle t lw compelled ctent-bsed speech  requrng NIFLA  dssemnte nmt b low-cost fmly plnnng servces t  not dscrmnte bsed  vewpt Relyng  ts  precedent n t fce   crcut splt regrdng t level  scrutny  pply n t bt-relted dsclosure ctext t Ct resed tht t type  speech t ssue n t cse ws pressl speech It ws tree subject  nterdte scrutny whch t fmly plnnng nmt dsclosure requrent survved 
T Ct l ffrd tht t requrent tht unlcensed fcltes dsclose tr unlcensed sttus survved ny level  scrutny
Fnlly t Ct greed wth t decs low tht NIFLA ws not enttled   prelmnry njunct  free exercse grounds fndng tht t Act    fclly neutrl lw  generl pplcblty tht survved rtl bss revew T Sre Ct’s grnt  certr  not nclude t ssue
case_name: National Institute of Family and Life Advocates v. Becerra
first_party: National Institute of Family and Life Advocates, et al.

textdata:
Fne Lozmn ws  resdent  t Cty  Rver Bech (t “Cty”) wre  ws  vocl crtc  t Cty’s pln  utlze emnent mn  redevelop t Rver Bech Mrn After t redevelopnt pln ws pproved Lozmn fled sut gnst t Cty  t Fld Sunshne Lw seekng  nvldte t Cty’s pprovl  t pln due  nsuffcent publc notce  t ergency etng  whch t pln hd en pproved T cty councl t n  closed sess  dscuss t lwsut nd t etng trnscrpt seed  reflect counclmrs suggestng tht t Cty  employ ntmdt tctcs n fghtng Lozmn’s clm 
On Novemr 15 2006 Lozmn ttended  regulrly scduled cty councl etng nd ws grnted permss  spek  t n-gend publc comnt pt  t etng Wn t ws  turn  spek  ttempted  gn dscussng crt n locl gnnt nd  counclmr nstructed   dsctnue  comnts  tht pc Lozmn repetedly ged t counclmr’s nstructs nd s ultmtely nstructed  Cty polce fcer  rrest Lozmn 
Lozmn ws chrged wth nter l dsturbng  lwful ssembly T prosecutng ttney ccluded tht tre ws probble cuse  t rrest  dsmssed t chrges  t grounds tht successful prosecut ws unlkely 
In Februry 2008 Lozmn fled sut gnst t Cty  42 USC § 1983  t grounds tht t Cty hd rrested  t t cty councl etng n retlt   oppost  t redevelopnt pln He lleged (1) retlt  flse rrest  t Frst Andnt (2) unresble sezure  t Fth Andnt nd (3) comm lw flse rrest T cse nt  trl n Novemr 2014 wth Lozmn pperng pro se T jury found n fv  t Cty  ll clms Lozmn fled  mot   new trl whch t dstrct ct dened 
On ppel Lozmn rgued tht t dstrct ct erred n denyng  mot   new trl cuse t jury’s fndng  probble cuse  t chrge  dsturbng  lwful ssembly ws gnst t gret ght  t evdence T Eleventh Crcut rejected t ctent n lght  t evdence presented t trl It  explned tht  ts  precedent  fndng  probble cuse brs  clm  flse rrest  t Frst Andnt t Fth Andnt nd stte lw 
T Eleventh Crcut l rejected Lozmn’s chllenge  t dstrct ct’s nstruct  retlty nmus sttng tht ny err t nstruct  hve ctned ws hrmless cuse t jury’s probble cuse fndng defeted Lozmn’s retlty rrest clm s  mtter  lw T ppels ct l rejected Lozmn’s chllenge  t lor ct’s jury nstructs regrdng t Cty’s uthty  lmt publc comnt  cty councl etngs T Sre Ct’s grnt  certr  not nclude tse two ssues
case_name: Lozman v. City of Riviera Beach, Florida
second_party: The City of Riviera Beach, Florida

textdata:
Mrk A Sveen nd Kye L Meln re mrred n 1997 Sveen purchsed  lfe nsurnce polcy tht yer nd t follg yer  nd Meln t prmry nefcry nd  chldren t ctngent nefcres Sveen nd Meln dvced n 2007 nd Sveen ded n 2011 
Mnnet hd chnged ts probte code n 2002  pply  revoct--dvce sttute  lfe nsurnce nefcry desgnts Sveen hd never chnged t desgnt   lfe nsurnce polcy nd Meln ws tree stll lsted s t prmry nefcry t t t   deth 
T nsurnce compny fled n nterpleder  estblsh wtr t revoct--dvce sttute nullfed t desgnt Sveen’s chldren nd Meln cross-cld  t proceeds nd t dstrct ct grnted summry judgnt n fv  t chldren rejectng Meln’s ctent tht retroctvely pplyng t revoct--dvce sttute volted t Ctrct Cluse  t Csttut
T Eghth Crcut reversed nd remnded fndng tht  ts  precedent t dspostve ssue n t ctext ws t rght  t polcyholder  hve  wss crred  n ccdnce wth  ntents t t t  sgned t ctrct Applyng t revoct--dvce sttute retroctvely  deprve   tht rght n volt  t Ctrct Cluse

Mnnet Sttute § 211BII prohbts ndvduls  rng poltcl pprel t  round pollng plces  prmry  elect dys T text  t sttute  not defne “poltcl”  Mnnet elect fcls dstred polcy mterls  lp dentfy whch tems fell wthn t scope  t lw Elect fcls receved nstructs  request tht nye rng pprel whch volted t gudelnes ld  n t polcy mterls remove  c t  Whle fcls re nstructed  llow t pers  vote regrdless  tr complnce msde prosecut ws  possble co  n ndvdul refuse t removl  c- request
T cse rose wn Andrew Clek executve drect  Mnnet Voters Allnce ws temprly prevented  votng t  locl pollng plce n Novemr 2010 cuse  ws rng  t-shrt wth  Te Prty logo nd  t tht dvocted  t requrent   pho ID  vote
Mnnet Mjty Mnnet Voters Allnce nd Mnnet Nthstr Te Prty Ptrots lg wth tr sct Elect Integrty Wtch (EIW) fled  lwsut gnst t Mnnet Secretry  Stte nd vrous county elect fcls  enj encent  t sttute s uncsttutl T prtes cld tht t sttute volted t Frst Andnt fclly nd s-ppled nd ws selectvely enced whch l volted tr Equl Protect rghts
Intlly t dstrct ct dsmssed ll clms T Eghth Crcut ffrd s  t clms regrdng Equl Protect nd fcl Frst Andnt volts It reversed nd remnded t s-ppled Frst Andnt clm T dstrct ct ultmtely grnted summry judgnt gnst EIW et l  t s-ppled Frst Andnt clm Revewng de novo t grnt  summry judgnt gnst EIW t Eghth Crcut csdered EIW's clm tht t Mnnet sttute ws not resble s ppled  Te Prty pprel cuse t Te Prty s not  poltcl prty n Mnnet T Eghth Crcut ws unpersuded nd ld tht t dstrct ct ws crect n ts rulng snce EIW hd fled  present specfc fcts tht sed bnnng Te Prty pprel ws not resble gven t Mnnet sttute's purpose T Eghth Crcut ld tht EIW's rgunt tht voters n Te Prty pprel re ffected  selectve encent hd l fled s t fered nothng  thn specult tht voters rng otr ms  poltcl pprel voded encent  t sttute EIW et l tn petted t Sre Ct  decde wtr t lor cts’ rulng ws crect 
EIW ndctes n tr pett   wrt  certr tht tre s  crcut splt  t ssues presented wre t Eghth Crcut’s rulng lgns wth t DC nd Ffth Crcut whch  hve ld tht t gnnt hs uthty  bn ms  poltcl speech ner pollng plces T Fth nd Seventh Crcuts hve ld  ctrst tht  complete bn  ll poltcl speech bsent ny lmtng prncple s uncsttutl regrdless  t loct n whch  speech hs en bnned

Erk Hugs pleded gulty  drug nd frerm fenses nd entered n  ple greent wth t gnnt  Rule 11(c)(1)(C)  t Federl Rules  Crmnl Procedure T dstrct ct ccepted t greent nd sentenced Hugs ccdngly Hugs tn s  sentence reduct  18 USC § 3582(c)(2) whch permts defendnts  hve en “sentenced   term  mprsnt bsed   sentencng rnge tht hs subsequently en lored  t Sentencng Commss” T dstrct ct reled  Justce So’s ccurrng opn n Freemn v Unted Sttes 564 US 522 (2011) n determnng tht Hugs ws nelgble   sentence reduct cuse  ws not sentenced “bsed   sentencng rnge”    ple greent T Eleventh Crcut ffrd t dstrct ct’s holdng

Rene Sncz-Goz nd defendnts n three otr crmnl cses (collectvely “Defendnts”) objected   polcy (t “Polcy”)  t US Dstrct Ct  t Srn Dstrct  Cln (t “Dstrct”) whch requred tm  pper  pretrl n-jury proceedngs n full physcl restrnts T Polcy whch ppled   n-cusdy defendnts pperng n  proceedngs ws proposed  t US Mrshls Servce nd ccepted  t Dstrct’s judges
T mgstrte judges n ll f cses ruled t Defendnts’ objects  t Polcy T Defendnts ppeled tse denls  t dstrct ct nd l fled ergency mots chllengng t Polcy’s csttutlty T dstrct ct dened ll relef nd t f cses re cldted e t 9th Crcut
T 9th Crcut sttng en bnc cstrued t Defendnts’ ppels s petts  wrts  mndmus  ts servsy uthty nd found tht t hd jursdct  revew t Polcy’s csttutlty It explned tht whle t ndvdul Defendnts’ clms   moot  t t  revew due  tr crmnl cses endng nd t Polcy hvng en chnged  t Sre Ct’s precedent n Gersten v Pugh t Defendnts represented  broder gro  smlrly stuted people    njured  t Polcy  renstted Thus pplyng t cpble--repett-yet-evdng-revew mootness except t servsy mndmus cse ws not moot Hover cuse t Polcy ws no lger n effect t ct wthld  ml wrt  mndmus

Shrlne nd Ry Lundgren nd t Upper Skgt Indn Tr (t “Tr”)  djcent peces  property n Skgt County Wshngt T spce ten  fence runnng cross t wdth  t Tr’s property nd ts srn bder c  subject  dspute ten t prtes fter t Tr ttempted  ssert ershp  t n 2013
T Lundgrens’ property hd en n tr extended fmly snce pproxmtely 1947  whch t ty hd lwys treted t fence s t property lne In 2013 t Tr purchsed lnd  t th  t Lundgrens’ property nd re pprently not wre  t fence t tht t Wn ty dsced t ty nd t Lundgrens  tr ntent  ssert ershp rghts  t dsputed pt  lnd 
In 2015 t Lundgrens fled sut  quet ttle  t property seekng summry judgnt  t bss tht ty hd cqured t dsputed property  dverse possess  mutul cquescence nd recognt lg e t Tr b ts prcel T Tr moved  dsmss t cse  lck  subject mtter jursdct bsed  segn mmunty nd cuse t Lundgrens  not j tm s  necessry nd ndspensble prty T trl ct dened t Tr’s mot nd t Tr s drect dscretry revew In t resultng rulng t ct grnted t Lundgrens’ mot  summry judgnt fndng tht ty hd estblsd legl ershp  t dsputed property  dverse possess nd mutul recognt nd cquescence
T Wshngt Sre Ct ccepted t Tr’s nded mot  dscretry revew   pr ders nd ffrd T ct rejected t rgunt tht t cse   dsmssed  lck  jursdct due  t Tr’s segn mmunty whch netr t Tr  Cgress hd wved wth regrd  quet ttle cts T ct found tht cuse t hd n rem jursdct t Tr’s segn mmunty  not crete  brrer  jursdct
case_name: Upper Skagit Indian Tribe v. Lundgren

textdata:
Chn Agrtech s  holdng compny ncpted n Delwre wth  prncpl plce  busness n Bejng T compny represented tht t mnufctured nd ld gnc compound fertlzers nd otr grculturl products  frrs n  two zen provnces  Chn It lsted ts shres  NASDAQ n 2005 nd n 2009 repted  t SEC  net revenue  trple t mount t hd repted f yers erler In 2011 compny shreholders lleged frudulent busness prctces  Chn Agrtech T compny dened t llegts nd nnounced tht t  cduct n nternl nvestgt nd subsequently dsmssed ts ndependent udt Lter tht yer NASDAQ hlted trdng n nd ntted delstng proceedngs gnst Chn Agrtech’s sck nd n 2012 t SEC revoked t sck’s regstrt
Shreholders sued Chn Agrtech n two successve puttve clss cts n 2011 nd 2012 llegng vrous securtes lw volts gnst t compny nd severl ndvdul defendnts Clss certfct ws dened n  cses
Shreholder Mcl Resh br  thrd puttve clss ct gnst t compny nd ndvdul defendnts n 2014 llegng securtes lw volts rsng  t s fcts nd crcumstnces s t frst two cses Chn Agrtech moved  dsmss t complnt  t bss tht t hd en fled fter t two yer lmtts perod pplcble  t Securtes Exchnge Act  1934 Resh nd t ddtl plntffs rgued tht  t Arcn Ppe ∓ Cstruct v Uth lne  cses t lmtts perod hd en lled  tr clms  t pendency  t two pr clss cts T dstrct ct rejected t ctent fndng tht  Arcn Ppe nd ts progeny t lmtts perod ws lled s  ndvdul clss mrs  tht t Sre Ct hd not decded wtr n entrely new clss ct bsed   substntlly dentcl clss ws subject  t s rule It ruled tht t lmtts perod ws tree lled s  t ndvdul clms  t nd plntffs n t nstnt cse  not s  t puttve clss
T Nnth Crcut reversed wth  three-judge pnel fndng tht t plntffs’ clss ct  not  t-brred wre: (1) t nd plntffs hd en unnd n t two pr suts whch re gnst mny  t s defendnts nd nvolved t s lyng events; (2) t two pr cses re tly; (3) clss certfct ws dened n t erler cts; nd (4) pursunt  t Arcn Ppe lne  cses t nd plntffs’ ndvdul clms re lled  t pendency  t two pr clss cts T pnel explned tht permttng  clms  go wrd ws csstent wth t polcy gols  llng n generl T pnel  stted tht n lght  FRCP 23’s requrents s ll s prncples  comty nd preclus t exstng legl system ctns suffcent sfegurds  prevent ltgnts  flng repetus cts n lght  t rulng

Tmothy D Kos nd f otr defendnts re cvcted  thmptmne csprcy fenses Durng t sentencng phse  ech defendnt’s trl t gnnt moved  reduce t defendnt’s sentence  18 USC § 3553(e)  provdng substntl ssstnce  t prosecut n t prosecut  nvestgt  notr pers T dstrct ct n ech cse grnted t gnnt’s mot nd reduced t defendnt’s sentence   term low t sttuty mndty mnmum All fve defendnts subsequently moved   sentence reducts  18 USC § 3582(c)(2) whch llows  dstrct ct  reduce t sentence  “ defendnt  hs en sentenced   term  mprsnt bsed   sentencng rnge tht hs subsequently en lored  t Sentencng Commss    f   reduct s csstent wth pplcble polcy sttents ssued  t Sentencng Commss”
T Eghth Crcut declned  follow t Fth Crcut pnel mjty n holdng tht defendnts re elgble  dscretry § 3582(c)(2) reducts Rtr t Eghth Crcut nterpreted t pln lnguge  t sttute  requre t sentence  bsed   rnge subsequently lored  t Commss nd tht n tse fve cses t sentence ws bsed nsted  t mndty mnmum nd tr substntl ssstnce Accdngly t Eghth Crcut ffrd t dstrct ct’s denl  sentencng reducts   ress dfferent   used  t dstrct ct
first_party: Timothy D. Koons, Kenneth Jay Putensen, Randy Feauto, Esequiel Gutierrez, and Jose Manuel Gardea

textdata:
Keth Thrpe ws cvcted n Geg stte ct  t Septemr 25 1990 murder   sster-n-lw Jcquelne Freemn A jury sentenced   deth nd t Geg Sre Ct ffrd  cvct nd sentence Subsequently n ffdvt c  lght n whch  whte jur  Thrpe’s trl Brney Gtte mde severl hghly dscrmnty sttents regrdng Afrcn Arcns Thrpe  s blck s hs relef  t Butts County Ser Ct clmng tht mproper rcl nmus hd nfluenced t jury’s delrts Hs pett ws dened  t bss tht  hd procedurlly defulted  flng  rse t rcl bs ssue n erler proceedngs nd cuse   not dequtely spt  clm tht neffectve ssstnce  counsel ws  bl  t omss Jur testmy ws l deed ndmssble  prove Thrpe’s rcl nmus clm He tn ppled   certfcte  probble cuse  ppel  t Geg Sre Ct nd  pplct ws dened 
Thrpe next petted t US Dstrct Ct  t Mddle Dstrct  Geg   wrt  hs cpus pursunt  28 USC § 2254 llegng tht rcl bs mg t jury hd rendered  cvct nd sentence unble  wthstnd csttutl scrutny T dstrct ct found t clm   procedurlly defulted  grnted   certfcte  ppel (COA)  n neffectve ssstnce clm T 11th Crcut tn ffrd t dstrct ct’s judgnt
Follg t US Sre Ct’s 2017 decss n Pen-Rodrguez v Col nd Buck v Dvs Thrpe petted t dstrct ct  FRCP 60(b)(6)  reopen  § 2254 cse He rgued tht Pen-Rodrguez  pply retroctvely llg   present t jur testmy tht hd prevously en deed ndmssble nd ultmtely co procedurl defult  prevl   clm tht mproper rcl nmus hd led   cvct nd sentence T dstrct ct dened Thrpe’s mot ccludng nter l tht  clm ws procedurlly defulted nd tht  hd fled  produce ny cler evdence tht Gtte’s sttents hd nfluenced t jury’s ccluss T 11th Crcut ffrd declnng  ssue  COA nd sttng tht Thrpe hd fled  s tht t dstrct ct’s crectness ws debtble wth regrd  ts procedurl rulng

In 2011 t Stte  Mrylnd engged n  process  redstrctng whch n tht stte entls two prllel procedures:  publc-fcng procedure led  t G’s Redstrctng Advsy Commttee nd n nternl procedure nvolvng Mrylnd’s cgressl delegt nd  csultng frm clled NCEC Servces Inc NCEC developed smple mps usng voter demogrphc dt  computer progrm nd  propretry trc tht predcts t lkelhood  Democrtc cnte success In comprs  smple mps submtted  thrd prtes t NCEC-developed mps re ssessed    lkely  see Democrtc cnte success Tre s no evdence tht t fnl mp tht ws encted  lw ws e  t es developed  NCEC; rtr r G Mrtn O’Mlley testfed tht t legsltve drect nd stff  t Mrylnd Deprtnt  Plnnng lkely creted t fnl cunt After t 2011 pln ws mplented t “Cook Prtsn Votng Index” rted t Sxth Dstrct s  “lkely” Democrtc set wres e t 2011 pln t Sxth Dstrct ws  “sfe” Republcn set In t 2012 cgressl elect Democrt John Delney defeted ncumnt Republcn cgressmn Roscoe Brtlett   209% mrgn Subsequent elects sw otr Democrtc cntes succeedng  Republcn cntes
T plntffs s  prelmnry njunct brrng t Stte  encng t 2011 redstrctng pln nd requrng t Stte  mplent  new mp n dvnce  t 2018 mdterm elects A mjty  t dstrct ct pnel dened t mot nd styed t cse pendng t co  Gll v Whtd notr gerrymnderng cse e t US Sre Ct
second_party: Linda H. Lamone, Administrator, Maryland State Board of Elections, et al.

textdata:
Indvdul voters n Texs lg wth gnzts representng Ltnos nd Afrcn Arcns fled  numr  lwsuts n 2011 chllengng t Texs legslture’s cgressl nd stte house redstrctng plns T cts re cldted nd proceed n t US Dstrct Ct  t Western Dstrct  Texs (“Texs Dstrct Ct”) T plntffs lleged rcl gerrymnderng n volt  § 2  t Votng Rghts Act (VRA) s ll s t 14th nd 15th Andnts  t Unted Sttes Csttut At tht t Texs ws bound  t preclernce requrents  § 5  t VRA nd tree t Stte smultneously fled n ct n t US Dstrct Ct  t Dstrct  Columb (“DC Dstrct Ct”) seekng preclernce  t redstrctng plns 
Whle trl proceedngs re pendng n  dstrct cts t 2012 prmry elects re pprochng As  result t Texs Dstrct Ct ssud t tsk  mplentng nterm redstrctng plns whch t   n expedted bss wth ccess  ll relevnt fcts nd wth t stndng tht  prtes  t ltgt lleged tht  plns ctned mny  t s sttuty nd csttutl nfrmtes s t chllenged plns T US Sre Ct vcted t frst tert  t nterm mps  t grounds tht t ct hd not en suffcently deferentl  t legslture; t Texs Dstrct Ct ssued  deferentl plns n Februry 2012 
T DC Dstrct Ct subsequently dened preclernce  t proposed redstrctng plns  t bss tht ty re encted wth dscrmnty ntent nd hd t effect  brdgng mty votng rghts Texs ppeled t decs  t US Sre Ct
After t Texs Dstrct Ct’s nterm mps re used  t 2012 elects t Texs legslture fled  tke ny ct  redstrctng n t 2013 regulr sess Hover t cvened  specl sess  whch t pted mg otrs t Texs Dstrct Ct’s cgressl nterm mp (“Pln C235”) wth ny chnges T g subsequently sgned t legslt ptng t pln
In June 2013 t US Sre Ct decded Sl County v Holder whch removed t § 5 preclernce requrents  t VRA Texs ws tree no lger umtclly subject  preclernce requrents nd t US Sre Ct lter vcted nd remnded   proceedngs t DC Dstrct Ct’s preclernce decs whch t lor ct tn dsmssed s moot
T defendnts subsequently s  dsmss t plntffs’ clms n t Texs Dstrct Ct  lck  subject mtter jursdct  t bss tht t cse hd co moot In respse t plntffs expressed tr desre  nd tr complnts regrdng t 2011 plns nd  chllenge t 2013 plns T ct grnted tm leve  nd nd dened t Stte’s mots  dsmss T ct explned tht t plntffs’ clms regrdng t 2011 plns re not moot cuse nter l t plntffs ctnued   hrd  tm T ct l dered tht t 2013 plns whch ncluded Pln C235  used  t 2014 elects T plntffs tn fled tr nded complnts ncludng clms relted   t 2011 nd 2013 plns Most plntffs ncluded clms tht Pln C235 volted § 2  t VRA nd t 14th nd 15th Andnts
T Texs Dstrct Ct ld trls  t 2011 plns n 2014 nd found tht ty volted certn spects  § 2  t VRA nd t 14th Andnt In t gg ltgt t plntffs ctended tht t 2013 plns ncludng Pln C235 ncluded   t s elents tht t ct determned re t result  dscrmnty ntent  sttuty  csttutl volts s n t 2011 plns
In August 2017 t Texs Dstrct Ct ssued n nterlocuty der regrdng t plntffs’ C235 clms It found tht t rclly dscrmnty ntent nd effects dentfed n t 2011 plns crred   t 2013 plns wre t redstrctng lnes remned t s It explned tht t legslture hd pted t ct’s nterm plns (whch ncluded C235) s prt   ltgt strtegy tht ws desgned  nsulte t plns  ny  chllenge T legslture hd not engged n ny delrtve process  remove t dscrmnty elents  t plns e ptng tm  nsted ntentlly ed nd ctnued t dscrmnt n t exstng plns
T ct l ccluded tht t cfgurts  CD 27 nd CD 35  Pln C235 volted § 2  t VRA nd t 14th Andnt As  CD 27 though t ct hd found n 2012 tht t dstrct  not reflect  rclly dscrmnty purpose cuse t ws not possble  crete n ddtl Ltno opptunty dstrct n t reg t Texs legslture hd stll engged n vote dlut Regrdng CD 35 t ct stted tht whle C235 ws encted n 2013 t chllenged dstrct boundres tht t reflected re drwn n 2011 nd found  volte § 2  t VRA nd t 14th Andnt T ct explned tht t Texs legslture  not engge n ny nngful eft  clense t dscrmnty elents  t 2013 pln e t ws pted nd n fct ntended  mntn tht dscrmnt n enctng t pln n substntlly t s m 
T ct ddtlly found tht t plntffs hd proven  § 2 “results” volt s  CD 27 HD 32 nd HD 34 nd  rcl gerrymnderng clm s  HD 90
T ct’s der drected t Texs Attney Generl  ssue  wrtten dvsy wthn three dys s  wtr t legslture  cvene  specl sess  ddress t ssue  redstrctng If t legslture  not pln  hold  specl sess t prtes re dered  pper e t ct  prepre redl redstrctng plns

Amg t terms  t settlent re tht Google  py $53 mll  t $83 mll tl  sx cy pres recpents provded tht ty greed  dedcte t funds  promotng educt nd nttves reltng  nternet prvcy T dstrct ct certfed t clss  settlent purposes nd prelmnrly pproved t settlent Notce ws sent   t clss n 2014 wth 13 clss mrs optng  nd 5 ncludng Thoms Frnk flng objects (“t Objects”) 
T dstrct ct pproved t prtes’ settlent n 2015 nd wth regrd  t objects found tht: (1) t cy pres wrd ws pproprte cuse t wrd ws n-dstrble (2) Rule 23(b)(3)’s serty requrent ws not ffected  wtr t wrd ws cy pres (3) tre ws  substntl nexus ten t cy pres recpents nd t nterests  t clss mrs nd tre ws no evdence tht t prtes’ preexstng reltshps wth t recpents nfluenced t select process nd (4) t mount  ttney fees ws comnsurte wth t neft  t clss
T Nnth Crcut pproved t dstrct ct’s rulng pprovng t settlent holdng tht t dstrct ct hd not bused ts dscret wth regrd  ny  t f fndngs descrd bove

In 2011 Vct Sttt tred  shove  loded hndgun n  grlfrend’s mh nd thretened  kll r A neghb clled t polce nd Sttt fled  lter surrendered  polce A jury found Sttt gulty  possess   frerm s  cvcted fel In lght  Sttt’s nne pr “volent fely” cvcts t ct desgnted Sttt s n rd creer crmnl  t Ard Creer Crmnl Act (ACCA) nd sentenced  ccdngly T ACCA pples   fels gulty  possessng  frerm  l hve t lest three pr cvcts   volent fely  serous drug fense Sttt ppeled t cvct rgung tht ne   nne pr cvcts csttuted “volent feles” T US Sre Ct’s 2015 decs n Johns v Unted Sttes nvldted t volent-fely sttus  three   pr cvcts levng ly sx ggrvted-burglry cvcts T Sxth Crcut hs ld tht Tennessee ggrvted burglry s  volent fely  t ACCA   pnel  tht ct ffrd t sentence Sttng en bnc t Sxth Crcut turned ts precedent nd ld tht  cvct  Tennessee ggrvted burglry es not qulfy s n ACCA volent fely
In  seprte cse Js Sms pleded gulty  ng  fel n possess   frerm nd receved n enhnced sentence  t ACCA bsed n prt  two pr Arknss resdentl burglry cvcts Sms ppeled  cvct nd t Eghth Crcut vcted  sentence nd remnded  cse  rerng
T US Sre Ct grnted certr n  cses nd cldted tm  t purpose  l rgunt At ssue n  cses s wtr t elents  t stte crs  whch t defendnts re cvcted re “t s s  nrror thn   t generl fense” If ty re broder thn   t generl fense tn ty cnnot serve s ACCA predcte fenses

Russell Bucklew ws cvcted   stte ct jury  murder kdnppng nd rpe nd ws sentenced  deth After exhustng t stte ppels process Bucklew ws scduled   executed  My 21 2014 He tn fled n ct n federl dstrct ct llegng tht execut  Mss’s lethl nject procol  csttute cruel nd unusul punshnt n volt  t Eghth Andnt s ppled   cuse   unque cgentl dcl cdt  whch  suffers Accdng  Bucklew lethl nject  lkely cuse   mrhge  t execut potentlly chokng    blood” As n lterntve thod Bucklew proposed execut  ntrogen hypox He l requested dscy  t qulfcts  two mrs  t lethl nject tem llegng tht ty mght not  qulfed  t posts  whch ty re hred
T dstrct ct grnted summry judgnt  t stte fndng tht Bucklew fled  s tht t stte’s execut thod “presents  rsk tht s sure   lkely  cuse serous llness nd needless sufferng nd gve rse  suffcently mmnent dngers” nd fled  propose “n lterntve tht s fesble redly mplented nd n fct sgnfcntly reduces  substntl rsk  severe pn”   whch steps re requred  US Sre Ct precedent Addtlly t dstrct ct dened Bucklew’s request  dscy fndng tht t ws npproprte  “ssu tht Mss employs persnel  re ncompetent  unqulfed  perm tr ssgned dutes” Revewng t dstrct ct’s fndngs de novo t US Ct  Appels  t Eghth Crcut ffrd t lor ct

Mcl Loos wked s n employee  BNSF Rlwy Compny untl  termnt n Novemr 2012   seres  ttendnce polcy volts Relted  t lest   t ttendnce volts ws n njury Loos sustned n 2010 wn  fell n t trn yrd After ng termnted Loos br two clms gnst  r employer:  clm  retlt  t Federl Rlrod Sfety Act (FRSA) nd  clm  neglgence  t Federl Employers Lblty Act (FELA) T dstrct ct found tht Loos hd not estblsd  prm fce cse  retlt  FRSA nd grnted BNSF's mot  summry judgnt  tht clm nd t Eghth Crcut ffrd
T FELA neglgence clm proceeded   jury trl nd t jury returned  verdct n fv  Loos—$30000  lost wges nd $1121278  dcl expenses BNSF moved  Federl Rule  Cvl Procedure 59(e)  fset t lost wges wrd  t mount  Loos’s shre  txes od  t RRTA T dstrct ct dened t mot fndng no RRTA tx ws od  t wrd T Eghth Crcut reved t determnt de novo nd found tht t text  RRTA s unmbguous n not ncludng dmges  lost wges n ts defnt  compenst s mey remunert  servces rendered Thus t Eghth Crcut ffrd t dstrct ct’s rulng usng lternte resng

In 2000 John Gu nd Denns Rnkn re hred  t Mount Lemm Fre Dstrct  poltcl subdvs  t Stte  Arz Ty re full-t frefghter cptns nd t ges 46 nd 54 respectvely re t two oldest full-t employees t t Fre Dstrct wn ty re termnted n 2009 Gu nd Rnkn fled ge dscrmnt chrges wth t Equl Employnt Opptunty Commss (EEOC) whch found resble cuse  leve tht t Fre Dstrct hd volted t Age Dscrmnt n Employnt Act (ADEA) 29 USC §§ 621-34 Gu nd Rnkn subsequently fled sut gnst t Fre Dstrct
T Fre Dstrct s summry judgnt  t bss tht t ws not n “employer” wthn t nng  t ADEA nd t dstrct ct greed A three-judge pnel  t Nnth Crcut reversed Rulng counter  wht otr crcuts hve ccluded t ppellte ct stted tht  poltcl subdvs   stte es not need  hve 20   employees s prvte sect employers  n der   ced  t ADEA
case_name: Mount Lemmon Fire District v. Guido

textdata:
Vern Mds hs en  deth row n Albm   30 yers nd hs hd severl serous strokes renderng  unble  remr commttng t cr  whch  s   executed He l exhbts otr sympms  brn dmge ncludng slurred speech blndness nblty  wlk ndependently nd urnry nctnence Mds ws gnlly scduled   executed n My 2016 nd  chllenged  competency n stte ct T ct dened  clm nd Mds tn s hs cpus relef n federl ct T US Ct  Appels  t Eleventh Crcut found tht  ws ncompetent   executed
In Novemr 2017 t US Sre Ct reversed t grnt  hs cpus relef n Dunn v Mds fndng tht t stte ct’s determnts  lw nd fct re “not  lckng n justfct” s  gve rse  err “yd ny possblty  frmnded dsgreent” s requred  t Antterrsm nd Effectve Deth Penlty Act  1996 (AEDPA)
Mds ws rescduled  execut  Jnury 2018 nd  gn petted stte ct  relef t t wth new evdence tht t ct-ppted expert  se testmy t pr cts reled hd en suspended  t prctce  psychology T ct gn dened  pett fndng Mds competent   executed Mds tn s sked t US Sre Ct  csder t csttutl ssues lyng  clm rtr thn t AEDPA es t ruled  erler

Domnc Olver completed n pprentceshp progrm fered  New Pr Inc (Pr) n nterstte truckng compny After Olver grduted  t progrm Pr representtves dvsed Olver  set   lmted lblty compny nd wk  Pr s n ndependent ctrct s mnfested  n ndependent ctrct opertng greent sgned  Olver  hlf   new LLC Olver lleges tht Pr exercsed sgnfcnt ctrol   wk ncsstent wth  sttus s n ndependent ctrct Olver termnted  ctrct reltshp wth Pr nd gn wkng s n employee  Pr wre  job respsbltes re “substntlly dentcl”    hd s n ndependent ctrct
Olver tn br  clss-ct lwsut gnst Pr llegng volts  t Fr Lb Stndrds Act (FLSA)  stte mnmum-wge sttute mg otr clms Pr fled  mot  compel rbtrt  t Federl Arbtrt Act (FAA) whch Olver opposed  t grounds tht t ctrct s exempted  Sect 1  t FAA nd tht nywy t quest  pplcblty  t Sect 1 exempt ws e  t ct  decde
T dstrct ct ccluded tht t quest  pplcblty  Sect 1  t FAA ws  t ct  decde nd t tn ld tht “ctrcts  employnt  trnsptt wkers” es not extend  ndependent ctrcts Hvng recd t cclus t dstrct ct dered ddtl dscy  t ssue  wtr Olver ws n employee  n ndependent ctrct n der   ble  decde wtr t ctrct ws  ctrct  employnt  Sect 1 T dstrct ct thus dened Pr’s mot  compel rbtrt
T US Ct  Appels  t Frst Crcut ffrd t dstrct ct’s der denyng t mot  compel rbtrt fndng tht t pplcblty  t FAA s  threshold quest  t ct  determne T ppellte ct tn ld tht Sect 1 es pply  greents tht purpt  estblsh n ndependent-ctrct reltshp

Anml Scence Products Inc et l (“Petters”) re US vtmn C purchsers  comnced  multdstrct clss ct lwsut gnst He Welco Phrmceutcl Co Ltd et l (“Respdents”) whch re busness enttes ncpted  t lws  Chn llegng volts  US nttrust lws Specfclly ty cld tht Respdents engged n prce-fxng nd sply mnpult n volt  t Srmn nd Clyt Acts Respdents  not deny tht ty hd codnted prces nd s  crete  sply shtge  moved  dsmss  t grounds tht ty cted n ccdnce wth Chnese gnnt regults requrng tm    T dstrct ct dened Respdents’ mot  dsmss nd  subsequent mot  summry judgnt Follg  jury trl t ct entered  judgnt  pproxmtely $147 mll gnst Respdents nd enjed tm  enggng n ny  nt-compettve ctvty
Respdents ppeled  t 2nd Crcut whch vcted t judgnt reversed t dstrct ct’s denl  t mot  dsmss nd remnded t cse wth nstructs  t lor ct  dsmss Petters’ complnt wth prejudce T ppellte ct bsed ts reversl  nterntl comty grounds explnng tht t dstrct ct hd erred n not deferrng pproprtely  t Chnese gnnt’s explnt  ts stc lws whch mndted t cduct  Respdents tht ws csdered nt-compettve  US lw Prtculrly gven tht t Chnese gnnt hd ppered n t proceedngs t fct tht Respdents  not smultneously comply wth US nd Chnese lws necesstted t cclus tht t dstrct ct  hve bstned  exercsng jursdct n t cse T ppels ct  ld tht otr fcts sgnfcnt  n nterntl comty blncng test derved  3rd nd 9th Crcut cse lw ffrd tht bstent ws pproprte n t nstnt mtter

textdata:
Rt G Devres nd Shrley McAfee re t wws  two US Nvy sls m ty llege developed cncer fter ty re exposed  sss wkng  Nvy shps nd n  nvl shpyrd Ty sued multple defendnts ncludng mnufcturers  “bre tl” shp compents  prts tht re mde nd shpped e ny sss-ctnng nsult mterls re dded T plntffs sued n stte ct  tes   neglgence nd strct lblty
T defendnt mnufcturers removed t cse  federl ct nd moved  summry judgnt bsed  t bre tl defense rgung tht ty  not  ld lble  t sls’ njures cuse ty shpped tr products  n bre tl m T dstrct ct grnted summry judgnt s   t neglgence nd strct lblty clms T plntffs ppeled nd t Thrd Crcut remnded wth nstructs  t dstrct ct   clerly ddress t plntffs’ neglgence clms nd  expln wtr t ws pplyng t brght-lne s opposed  t fct-specfc rule tht cn  relevnt  t bre tl defense nd regrdng whch crcuts re splt T dstrct ct gn grnted summry judgnt   clms sttng tht t ws pplyng t brght lne rule 
T plntffs ppeled gn  t Thrd Crcut  not csder tr strct lblty clms  ppel cuse t csdered tm bnned It tree ffrd t dstrct ct’s rulng n fv  summry judgnt  t defendnts s  strct lblty T Thrd Crcut reversed t summry judgnt rulng  t neglgence clm holdng tht mrt lw prncples permt t mnufcturer   bre tl product   ld lble  sss-relted njures wn ty re resbly eseeble results  t mnufcturer’s cts In  holdng t ppellte ct ppled t bre tl defense's fct-specfc stndrd rtr thn t brght-lne rule

Attney Rchrd Culrts represented f plntffs ppelng denls  Socl Securty nefts After successfully chllengng ll f denls Culrts sked t dstrct ct  wrd  ttney’s fees n  cses  42 USC § 406 nd t Equl Access  Justce Act 28 USC § 2412(d) Fees wrded  42 USC § 406(b) pertn  proceedngs n ct nd re sttutly lmted  25%  t pst-due nefts t clmnt receves Fees wrded  § 406() pertn  dmnstrtve proceedngs; tht sect es not explctly lmt t fee mount tht t Socl Securty Commsser cn wrd n tht ctext
In rulng  Culrts’s fee requests t dstrct ct reled  11th Crcut precedent lmtng t tl fee mount wrded   § 406() nd 406(b)  25%  t pst-due nefts wrded  t clmnts T nt tht n e cse  fee wrd ws lmted  25%  t pst-due nefts n two cses t dstrct ct declned  rule  t § 406(b) fee wrd untl t Commsser ruled  t §406() wrd ( s  not wrd  n mount tht exceeded 25%  t pst-due nefts) nd tht n t fnl cse t ct grnted  § 406(b) request  brred   requestng ny  fees  § 406() gn seekng  prevent   exceedng t 25% cp 
In  ppel Culrts ctended tht otr crcuts hve not ppled t 25% cp  t ggregte fee mount wrdble   § 406() nd (b)  nsted ppled tht lmt ly  § 406(b) fees T 11th Crcut rejected t rgunt pplyng ts pr precedent  ffrm t dstrct ct’s rulng

Budh Isl Jm nd otrs re Indn fsrn frrs nd otrs  lve n Gujrt Ind T Interntl Fnnce Cpt (IFC) s n nterntl gnzt dqurtered n Wshngt DC tht provdes ls n t developng wld  projects tht re unble  receve prvte cptl  T IFC led $450 mll  n Indn compny  t cstruct nd opert  t Tt Mundr Plnt n Gujrt Ind T l greent wth t Indn por compny ncluded provss tht t compny  not cuse dmge  surroundng communtes nd IFC retned servsy uthty nd  revoke fnncl spt  t project
T plnt’s cstruct nd opert  cuse hrm  t surroundng communtes s repted n IFC’s  nternl udt n volt  t greent Hover t IFC  not tke ny steps  ce t l recpents n complnce
T plntff fsrn nd frrs br t lwsut n federl ct n DC seekng dmges bsed lrgely  tt cuses  ct Ty l rsed  clm s n lleged thrd-prty nefcry  t ctrct ten IFC nd t por compny
T dstrct ct dsmssed t plntffs’ clm fndng tht IFC ws mmune  sut  t Interntl Orgnzts Immuntes Act (IOIA) nd  tht t IFC hd not wved ts mmunty  t sut T relevnt prt  IOIA provdes tht nterntl gnzts “shll enjoy t s mmunty  sut    s s enjoyed  egn gnnts except  t extent tht  gnzts  expressly wve tr mmunty  t purpose  ny proceedngs   t terms  ny ctrct” 22 USC § 288(b) T presdent  t Unted Sttes determnes wtr n gnzt s enttled   mmunty nd n executve der n 1956 desgnted t IFC s enttled  t “prvleges exempts nd mmuntes” cferred  t sttute
T Ct  Appels  t DC Crcut ffrd t dstrct ct fndng tht t IFC s mmune  IOIA nd tht t  not wve mmunty  t sut

T federl Amc Energy Act regultes nucler por genert n t Unted Sttes nd t Nucler Regulty Commss (NRC) ences t provss  t Act In t erly 1980s  urnum depost ws dsced n Pttsylvn County Vrgn  lnd ed  Coles Hll nd Bon Mnerls ( plntffs n t cse) T Vrgn Generl Assembly clled  t stte Col nd Energy Commss  evlute t effects  mnng urnum  n t nt bnned t mnng  urnum “untl  progrm  permttng urnum mnng s estblsd  sttute” Despte  recomndt  t stte commss t bn  urnum mnng remns n effect
Vrgn Urnum Coles Hlls nd Bon Mnerls fled  federl lwsut n t Western Dstrct  Vrgn skng t ct  declre t bn preempted  federl lw nd enjng t stte  grnt urnum mnng permts T dstrct ct grnted t stte’s mot  dsmss t lwsut fndng tht t AEA es not regulte n-federl urnum deposts nd thus es not preempt t stte lw bn Revewng t dstrct ct’s cclus de novo t Fth Crcut ffrd

Jne Doe entered t Unted Sttes s n unccompned m wn s ws eght eks pregnnt S ws detned  mmgrt uthtes nd plced n t cusdy  t Offce  Refugee Resettlent (ORR) S ws lter plced n  federlly funded slter n Texs wre fter  dcl exmnt s requested n bt ORR dened r request  t grounds tht gency polcy prohbted slter stff  tkng ny ct  fcltte n bt wth drect nd pprovl  t ORR drect bsent ergency crcumstnces
Doe’s gurdn d ltem Roclle Grz fled  puttve clss ct chllengng t csttutlty  ORR’s polcy  hlf  Doe nd “ll otr pregnnt unccompned ms n ORR cusdy” On Oct 18 2017 t dstrct ct ssued  tempry restrnng der (TRO) permttng Doe  hve n bt mdtely T next dy Doe ttended pre-bt counselng whch ws requred  Texs lw  tke plce t lest 24 hs n dvnce  t procedure nd wth t s ct   perm t bt
On Oct 20  pnel  t DC Crcut ct vcted t pertnent pts  t TRO  t grounds tht ORR’s polcy  not csttute n “undue burden” Hover sttng en bnc  Oct 24 t ppellte ct vcted t pnel der nd remnded t mtter  t dstrct ct T s dy Grz sked t ct  n nded restrnng der requestng tht t gnnt mke Doe vlble  repet t requred pre-bt counselng T dstrct ct grnted Grz’s request nd rrngents re mde  Doe  hve t counselng pptnt t 7:30 m  Oct 25
T detls  t subsequent events re dsputed  t gnnt  t mpress tht t est t bt  hppen ws Oct 26 nd Grz’s counsel tht ty plnned  ppel t new der erly  t mnng  Oct 25 Hover t s ct  cducted Doe’s pre-bt counselng c vlble  r Oct 25 pptnt  t pptnt ws moved   4:15 m nd Doe hd t bt nsted  repetng t counselng wth  new ct
Becuse t bt mde t gnnt’s clm moot t  not sk t Sre Ct  revew t en bnc der s plnned  nsted fled  pett  certr  nullfy t ppellte ct’s en bnc rulng  tht t  not stnd s precedent T gnnt l s sncts gnst Grz’s lwyers rgung tht ty hd mde msrepresentts n n ttempt  vod Sre Ct revew

textdata:
T lwsut rose   Apple’s hndlng  t sle  pps  ts Phe devces Apple relesed t Phe n 2007 nd  t set t hs en  “closed system” nng tht Apple ctrols whch pps cn  loded  n Phe whch t es v t “App Ste” Although Apple develops   t pps ld n t App Ste  re developed  thrd prtes F e App Ste sle mde   thrd-prty developer Apple receves 30%  t sle prce
In 2011 f nd plntffs fled  puttve nttrust clss ct complnt gnst Apple llegng mopolzt nd ttempted mopolzt  t Phe pp mrket T complnt ws dsmssed  techncl grounds s re severl subsequent ttempts t smlr lwsuts   t s nd otr plntffs In Septemr 2013  set  plntffs ncluded n tr llegts suffcent fcts  t lwsut  move wrd Amg tse fcts ws t key llegt tht ech plntff hd purchsed Phe pps  t App Ste nd tht tse trnscts nvolved Apple collectng t entre purchse prce nd pyng t developers fter t sle
Apple fled yet notr mot  dsmss t lwsut ctendng tht t plntffs lcked sttuty stndng  sue  t US Sre Ct’s precedent n Illnos Brck Co v Illnos 431 US 720 (1977) Under Illnos Brck “ly t chrged drect purchser nd not otrs n t chn  mnufcture  dstr”  brng  lwsut  nttrust volts If t plntffs re csdered  hve purchsed tr Phe pps drectly  t pp developers tn ty cnnot sue Apple Hover f ty re csdered  hve b t pps  Apple tn ty  sue Apple
T dstrct ct found tht t plntffs lcked stndng  sue  Illnos Brck nd dsmssed t cse wth prejudce On ppel t Nnth Crcut reved t dstrct ct’s decs de novo nd found tht ctrry   rulng  t s ssue  t US Ct  Appels  t Eghth Crcut t plntffs re drect purchsers  Apple wthn t nng  Illnos Brck nd thus hve stndng

John Sturge wnted  use  hcrft  t Nt Rver whch runs  Alsk’s Yuk-Chrley Ntl Preserve cservt unt desgnted s   t Alsk Ntl Interest Lnds Cservt Act (ANILCA) 16 USC § 3101 et seq  rech moose huntng grounds T Stte  Alsk  permt     wres t federl gnnt  not pursunt  Ntl Prk Servce regults Sturge rgued tht t Nt Rver lged  Alsk nd tht t Ntl Prk Servce  not regulte  prohbt t use  hcrft  tht pt  t rver Sturge s declrty nd njunctve relef brrng t Prk Servce  encng ts hcrft bn T dstrct ct nd ppellte ct dened  relef nterpretng t sttute s lmtng t Prk Servce’s uthty  mpose Alsk-specfc regults  nholdngs  not ts uthty  ence ntwde regults lke t hcrft rule T US Sre Ct rejected t nterprett nd remnded t cse   csdert
On remnd  t US Sre Ct t Nnth Crcut ccluded tht t Nt Rver ws publc lnd  purposes  ANILCA nd thus tht t ws subject  t regulty uthty  t Ntl Prk Servce
second_party: Bert Frost, in His Official Capacity as Alaska Regional Director of the National Park Service, et al.

textdata:
On Jnury 23 2015 Glr Grz Jr entered n Ald ple—tht s  ple mntnng nnocence  ccedng tht t evdence s lkely  cvnce  jury  gult yd  resble ubt— ggrvted ssult On Februry 24 2015  pleded gulty  possess   ctrolled substnce wth ntent  delver Both ple greents requred Grz  wve  rght  ppel T dstrct ct ccepted t ple greents nd mposed t sentence n ccdnce wth   tm Shtly fter sentencng Grz nd  trl counsel tht  wsd  ppel  counsel declned  fle t ppel ctng Grz's wvers
F mths fter  ws cvcted nd sentenced Grz fled  pett  post-cvct relef n ech cse llegng tht  trl ttney ws neffectve  not flng notces  ppel Grz’s ttney stted n n ffdvt tht   not fle n ppel cuse Grz hd wved  rght  ppel  cceptng t ple greents T dstrct ct dsmssed Grz’s pett  open t ppels perod  t bss  neffectve ssstnce  counsel nd t ppellte ct ffrd t dsmssl
Under Roe v Fles-Orteg 528 US 470 (2000) crmnl defendnts hve  Sxth Andnt rght  “resbly effectve” legl ssstnce A defendnt clmng neffectve ssstnce  counsel must s: (1) tht counsel’s representt ws defcent; nd (2) tht counsel’s defcent permnce prejudced t defendnt Generlly counsel’s flure  fle n ppel t  crmnl defendnt’s request s presslly unresble nd tree defcent nd  federl crcut cts nterpret Fles-Orteg  n tht ttneys re neffectve wn ty  not fle n ppel f t clents requested t regrdless  wtr t defendnts hd wved tr rghts
T Idho Sre Ct ld ctrry  t mjty  federl crcut cts fndng tht Fles-Orteg es not requre n umtc “presumpt  prejudce” wn counsel declnes  fle n ppel n lght  n ppel wver Rtr t defendnt must stll s defcent permnce nd resultng prejudce

T technology never mterlzed nd W2E s  vod complete fnncl run  ferng   $15 mll n “dentures”—whch s debt secured ly  t debt’s ernng por rtr thn   len   tngble sset At t t W2E’s  recent SEC flng  not ndcte t possble devlut  t compny’s ntngble ssets nd stted ly tht ty re wth  $10 mll
After n udt W2E fled  Fm 8-K reptng tl mprnt  ts ntngble ssets nd vlung ts tl ssets t $370552 Lenzo’s secretry lerted  v eml b t nded flngs nd Lenzo ctcted t Chrles Vst brokers b tm Nerly two eks lter Lenzo emled two potentl nvests “severl key pts” b W2E’s pendng denture ferng  rtr thn even ntng t devlut  W2E’s ntngble ssets  ssured  tht t ferng c wth “3 lyers  protect” whch re: $10 mll n “cfrd ssets”; purchse ders nd LOIs  “ $43 [mll] n ders”; nd Chrles Vst hs greed  rse ddtl mes  repy t denture holders f necessry One  tse emls stted t hd en sent “t t request  [Lenzo’s boss]” nd t otr stted t ws sent “t t request  [notr broker wth t frm]” Lenzo’s n nd ttle re t t botm   emls
T SEC chrged Lenzo  boss nd Chrles Vst wth voltng three securtes-frud provss: Sect 17()(1)  t Securtes Act  1933; Sect 10(b)  t Securtes Exchnge Act  1934 nd Securtes Exchnge Act Rule 10b-5 Lenzo’s boss nd Chrles Vst settled t chrges gnst tm  Lenzo proceeded  relut e t gency An ALJ found tht Lenzo hd wllfully volted ll three provss  t Securtes nd Exchnge Acts   msrepresentts  nvests On revew t full Commss sustned t ALQ’s decs nd Lenzo ppeled  t US Ct  Appels  t DC Crcut whch ld t Commss’s fndngs s  two  t provss  reversed s  ts fndng tht  volted Rule 10b-5(b) Tht provs prohbts t mkng  mterlly flse sttents n cnect wth t purchse  sle  securtes A mjty  t DC Crcut pnel found tht cuse Lenzo’s boss not Lenzo self retned “ultmte uthty”  t sttents Lenzo  not volte tht provs  t US Sre Ct’s defnt  “mker”  flse sttents n Jnus Cptl Gro Inc v Frst Dervtve Trders 564 US 135 (2011)

FTB ppeled  t US Sre Ct nd t Ct ld t ct’s determnt tht FTB ws enttled ly  prtl mmunty  comty prncples Two otr quests  t ltgt mde tr wy  t US Sre Ct nd t Ct (1) splt 4–4 s  wtr t  rule Nevd v Hll whch provdes “tht e Stte … cn open t s  ts cts   prvte ctzen’s lwsut gnst notr Stte … wth t otr Stte’s csent” nd (2) ld tht t Csttut es not permt Nevd  wrd dmges gnst Cln gences  ts stte lw tht re greter thn t  wrd gnst Nevd gences n smlr crcumstnces Wth tse prelmnry legl quests relved  Nevd jury fnlly found n fv  Hytt nd wrded  $85 mll  emotl dstress $52 mll  nvs  prvcy  $1  specl dmges  frud nd $250 mll n puntve dmges T Nevd Sre Ct ssued holdng t dmges subject  t sttuty cps  whch FTB s enttled csstent wth t US Sre Ct’s holdng  tht ssue

Troy Lmrt purchsed n lleged phrodsc detry splent tht ws mnufctured  Nutrceutcl  tht hd not en pproved  t Food nd Drug Admnstrt (FDA) Bsed  t product’s lls Lmrt leved tht t splent  enhnce  sexul permnce nd hd  kn tse clms re flse   not hve purchsed t product 
Lmrt leved tht t product volted FDA regults cuse t purpted  ncrese sexul desre  hd not en  clncl testng nd cuse t ws not FDA-pproved He  lleged tht t product lleglly fled  promnently dsply t lck  FDA pprovl  ts llng nd tht t llng l fled  nt  potentlly dngerous ngredent Lmrt fled  csur clss ct  Federl Rule  Cvl Procedure (FRCP) 23(b)(3) llegng stte lw clms relted  unfr compett flse dvertsng nd otr volts
T dstrct ct grnted clss certfct bsed  t full refund dmges model whch pples wn  product s useless nd nvolves clcultng t verge retl prce nd t numr  unts ld T judge rng t cse retred nd Lmrt’s ct ws ressgned   new judge Dscy ws completed nd Nutrceutcl fled  mot  decertfct T new judge grnted t mot fndng tht Lmrt hd fled  provde essentl evdence  pply  clsswde dmges model nng tht comm ssues  not premnte s requred  Rule 23(b)(3) 
Ten dys fter t der ws ssued decertfyng t clss Lmrt nd t ct tht  ntended  fle  mot  recsdert nd t ct nstructed   fle t mot wthn ten dys whch ws tnty dys fter t decertfct der In ccdnce wth t ct’s nstructs Lmrt fled  mot  recsdert ten dys lter hghlghtng evdence   clss certfct mot tht   used  spt t full refund dmges model He l fered n lterntve dmges model  t frst t bsed  n-resttutry enggent 
Three mths lter t ct dened  mot  recsdert rejectng  proposed dmges models Lmrt tly fled  pett  Rule 23(f)  permss  ppel t dstrct ct’s ders denyng t mot  recsdert nd grntng t mot  clss decertfct  t 9th Crcut whch cdtlly grnted  pett
A three-judge pnel  t 9th Crcut ld tht Lmrt’s Rule 23(f) pett  clss certfct hd en tly fled wth t ppellte ct T ct explned tht cuse Rule 23(f)’s 14-dy dedlne ws procedurl rtr thn jursdctl equtble excepts  s llng  pply It l ld tht flng  mot  recsdert e t Rule 23(f) dedlne  ll t dedlne T pnel  ld tht otr crcumstnces  ll t dedlne In t cse Lmrt hd nd t dstrct ct   ntent  fle  mot  recsdert wthn Rule 23(f)’s 14-dy wnw nd hd submtted t flng wthn t ten-dy t fr set  tht ct T pnel ccluded tht  tse crcumstnces t dedlne   lled nd Lmrt’s mot  recsdert   csdered tly fled wth t Nnth Crcut whle recognzng tht  numr  otr crcuts  lkely rech t opposte cclus

T US Deprtnt  Helth nd Humn Servces (HHS) dmnsters t Medcre progrm whch provdes lth nsurnce  Arcns 65 nd older Ptents  obtn cge  dfferent “prts”  Medcre two  whch re t ssue n t cse Wn ptents enrolled n Medcre Prt A receve lthcre t gnnt mkes drect pynts  hosptls  t servces provded Ptents enrolled n Medcre Prt C receve  gnnt subsdy  enroll n  prvte nsurnce pln Imptntly ptents enrolled n Prt A tend  hve lor ncos thn  enrolled n Prt C
HHS ctrcts wth “fscl nterdres”  remburse lthcre servce provders  servces rendered  Medcre Prt A ptents Tse nterdres mke n ntl pynt bsed  n estmte  t cost  servces provded nd re lter djusted bsed  ctul cost repts
T Medcre Act uthzes rembursent djustnts  ncrese pynts  hosptls tht tret  dspropttely hgh numr  low-nco ptents T rte  djustnt s clculted n prt bsed  t numr  “ptent dys”  ptents “enttled  nefts  prt A”  Medcre In 2012 HHS s  nterpret t phrse s ncludng ptent dys  ptents enttled  nefts  Prt C  Medcre s ll Includng Prt C dys n t djustnt clculus  result n lor rembursent rtes whch trnsltes n hundreds  mlls  llrs
T plntff hosptls chllenged t rte djustnt n t Provder Rembursent Revew Bd s requred  sttute T Bd ccluded tht t lcked uthty  relve t ssue whch trggered expedted revew e t federl dstrct ct T dstrct ct grnted summry judgnt  HHS fndng tht t rte djustnt ws n “nterpretve rule”  t Admnstrtve Procedure Act (APA) nd thus ws exempt  t APA’s notce-nd-comnt requrent  new rules T hosptls ppeled nd t US Ct  Appels  t DC Crcut reversed fndng tht t djustnt ws not rely n “nterpretve rule” nd tht HHS volted t Medcre Act  promulgtng t rule wth provdng notce nd t opptunty  comnt

Petter Js L Ks s  vetern  t US Mrne Cps  served n t Vetnm Wr In 1982 Ks fled  clm  dsblty nefts wth t Deprtnt  Veterns Affrs (VA) ssertng tht  suffered  post-trumtc stress dsder (PTSD) s  result   servce n Vetnm Ultmtely t VA dened  clm n My 1983 In June 2006 Ks s revew   prevously dened clm nd t VA grnted  relef  38 CFR § 3156() whch llows  petter  “reopen”  denl  “submttng new nd mterl evdence” In  2006 pett Ks dentfed mterls sptng  clm tht exsted n 1983  whch re not scted wth  fle
Notbly t VA  not grnt Ks relef  Sect 3156(c) whch uthzes t gency  “recsder”  prevously dened clm n t event tht t “receves  sctes wth t clms fle relevnt fcl servce deprtnt recds tht exsted nd hd not en scted wth t clms fle wn VA frst decded t clm” T provs s  fvble  veterns cuse t provdes   retroctve effectve dte  ny nefts wrded wres nefts grnted  Sect 3156() re effectve ly  t dte t pplct  reopen ws fled
T VA’s decs (technclly mde  t Bd  Veterns Appels) reled  t nng  t term “relevnt” s used n 38 CFR § 3156(c)(1) T VA found tht t ddtl cunts (Ks’s Fm 214 nd t Combt Hsty cunt)  not qulfy s “relevnt”  purposes  t sect cuse t  not “suggest  tter yet estblsh tht [petter] hs PTSD s  current dsblty” In t VA’s vew recds re not “relevnt” wn ty re not “co determntve”
Ct  Appels  Veterns Clms ffrd t Bd’s decs nd t Federl Crcut ffrd s ll

In t wds  t Nnth Crcut decs low “[t] cse rses    complex set  bnkrtcy proceedngs”
Petter Brdley Tggrt s  rel estte developer  ed 25% nterest n Srwood Prk Busness Center (“SPBC”) Respdents Terry Emrt nd Keth Jehnke l ech ed  25% nterest n SPBC In 2007 Tggrt purpted  trnsfer  shre  SPBC   ttney John Bermn
Emrt nd Jehnke sued Tggrt nd Bermn n Oreg stte ct llegng tht t trnsfer volted SPBC’s opertng greent  not llg Emrt nd Jehnke t rght  frst refusl Emrt nd Jehnke l s ttneys’ fees Tggrt moved  dsmss t clm nd fled  counterclm  ttneys’ fees
In Novemr 2009 shtly e t cse nt  trl Tggrt fled  voluntry Chpter 7 bnkrtcy pett T stte-ct ct ws styed pendng t relut  t bnkrtcy pett nd n Februry 2010 Tggrt receved  dschrge n t bnkrtcy proceedngs
After t dschrge Emrt nd Jehnke represented  ttney Sturt Br ctnued t stte-ct ct Tggrt ws lrgely bsent  subsequent proceedngs lthough Bermn rened  mot  dsmss  Tggrt’s hlf t t close  evdence After  trl t stte ct ruled n fv  Emrt nd Jehnke nd unwound t trnsfer  Tggrt’s shre  SPBC  Bermn nd expelled Tggrt  t compny T stte ct entered  judgnt tht llod ny prty  pett  ttneys’ fees whch led  yet  complcted ltgt n stte nd federl cts
Br t ttney  Emrt nd Jehnke fled  pett  ttneys’ fees n stte ct  hlf  SPBC Emrt nd Jehnke gnst  Bermn nd Tggrt  lmtng fees gnst Tggrt   ncurred fter t dte  Tggrt’s bnkrtcy dschrge T pett notfed t ct  Tggrt’s bnkrtcy dschrge  rgued   stll  lble  ttneys’ fees  t ty tht Tggrt hd “returned  t fry”
Whle t ttneys’ fee pett ws pendng n stte ct Tggrt s  reopen  bnkrtcy proceedng n bnkrtcy ct Once reopened Tggrt sked t ct  hold Br Jehnke Emrt nd SPBC (collectvely t “Credts”) n ctempt  voltng t bnkrtcy dschrge  seekng n wrd  ttneys’ fees gnst  n t stte ct ct
T stte ct ruled tht Tggrt hd “returned  t fry” s  mtter  lw     ld lble  ttneys’ fees ncurred fter  bnkrtcy Tggrt tly ppeled t stte-ct determnt
Subsequently t bnkrtcy ct dened Tggrt’s mot  ctempt greeng wth t stte ct tht Tggrt hd “returned  t fry” On ppel t dstrct ct reversed fndng tht Tggrt’s cts  not csttute  “return  t fry” nd thus t dschrge njunct brred t clm gnst   ttneys’ fees T dstrct ct remnded   determnt wtr t Credts hd “kngly volted t dschrge njunct n seekng ttneys’ fees” On remnd t bnkrtcy ct found ty hd kngly volted t dschrge njunct nd thus ld tm n ctempt On ppel t Bnkrtcy Appellte Pnel (“BAP”) reversed t bnkrtcy ct’s fndng  ctempt fndng ty hd  good fth lef tht t dschrge njunct  not pply  tr ttneys’ fee clm
Bck n stte ct t stte ppellte ct found tht Tggrt’s cts  not csttute  “return  t fry” nd thus reversed t stte trl ct s  ts rulng  ttneys’ fees As  result t federl dstrct ct nd t stte ppellte ct  greed tht t Credts  not pursue ttneys’ fees gnst Tggrt nd t BAP’s rulng freed tm  ng ld n ctempt  kngly voltng t dschrge njunct
T Nnth Crcut ffrd t BAP’s opn holdng tht t Credts  not kngly volte t dschrge njunct nd thus  not  ld n ctempt cuse ty hd  subjectve good-fth lef tht t dschrge njunct  not pply  tr stte-ct clm  ttneys’ fees

In 1986 Dnny Hll ws cvcted n n Oho ct  t tture rpe nd murder   12-yer-old boy An nterdte stte ct ffrd  cvct s  t Oho Sre Ct T US Sre Ct dened certr n 1993
After unsuccessfully seekng  obtn post-cvct relef n stte nd federl ct Hll fled  new pett n Oho stte ct rgung tht  deth sentence ws llegl  Atkns v Vrgn 536 US 304 (2002) whch ld tht t Eghth Andnt prohbts t crmnl execut   defendnt  s “ntlly retrded” T trl ct dened t clm n nterdte ct ffrd t denl nd t Oho Sre Ct dened revew
In 2010 Hll fled  federl hs pett  28 USC § 2254 seekng federl revew   Atkns clm T federl dstrct ct dened t pett  t Sxth Crcut reversed nd grnted hs relef  28 USC § 2254(d)(1) whch pples wn  stte-ct djudct “resulted n  decs tht ws ctrry   nvolved n unresble pplct  clerly estblsd Federl lw s determned  t Sre Ct  t Unted Sttes” Though t expressly dscld relnce  t Sre Ct’s 2017 decs n Moe v Texs 581 US __ (2017)—n whch t Ct struck wn  stte lw tht reled  dted dcl stndrds n determnng ntellectul dsblty  t purpose  elgblty  t deth penlty—t Sxth Crcut repetedly cted t lnguge nd t decs  Moe tself n rechng ts decs grntng t pett

Emulex Cp  Delwre compny tht ld computer compents nd Avgo Technologes Wreless Mnufcturng Inc nnounced n Februry 2015 tht ty hd entered n  rger greent wth Avgo ferng  py $800  e shre  stndng Emulex sck whch ws 264% hgr thn t vlue  Emulex sck t dy e t rger ws nnounced Pursunt  t terms  t rger greent Erld Merger Sub Inc ntted  tender fer  Emulex’s stndng sck n Aprl 2015 (A tender fer s  type  tke bd n whch t fer publcly fers  purchse  specfed mount  t trget compny’s sck usully t  prce hgr thn mrket vlue)
It s cusmry  t trget compny  ssue  sttent  shreholders recomndng tht ty etr ccept  reject t tender fer Bee ssung   sttent Emulex hred Goldmn Schs  determne wtr t proposed rger greent   fr  shreholders Goldmn Schs determned tht t   fr despte  low-verge rger premum nd Emulex ssued  sttent csstent wth tht determnt So  t shreholders re unhppy wth t rger’s terms nd br  clss ct lwsut gnst Emulex Avgo Merger Sub nd t Emulex Bd  Drects llegng volts  federl securtes lws
T dstrct ct dsmssed t complnt wth prejudce fndng tht t led plntff’s clm  Sect 14(e)  not pled t requste ntl culpblty  clms  tht sect t seprte clm  Sect 14(d) fled cuse tht sect es not estblsh  prvte rght  ct  shreholders cfrted wth  tender fer nd ts Sect 20() clm cuse ts frst two clms re nsuffcent
Revewng de novo t dstrct ct’s grnt  t defendnts’ mot  dsmss t Nnth Crcut reversed t decs s  t Sect 14(e) clm ( ffrd s  t Sect 14(d) clm) Ctng t US Sre Ct’s ntervenng decss n Ernst ∓ Ernst v Hochfelder 425 US 185 (1976) nd Ar v SEC 446 US 680 (1980) t Nnth Crcut dsgreed wth t fve otr crcuts tht hve nterpreted Sect 14(e) Under t Nnth Crcut’s vew clms  Sect 14(e)  t Securtes Exchnge Act  1934 15 USC § 78n(e) requre  sng  neglgence not scenter (ntent  knowledge  wrgng)

On Novemr 19 2015  jury found defendnt Murce Lmt Dvs gulty  sx counts ncludng t llegl use  crryng   frerm n relt   cr  volence ( “Hobbs Act robry”) nd t llegl use  crryng   frerm  d nd t csprcy  commt  cr  volence Al  Novemr 19 2015  jury found defendnt Andre Lev Gl gulty  seven counts ncludng t two counts descrd bove
On ppel t US Ct  Appels  t Ffth Crcut ssued n opn  Jnury 31 2017 denyng  defendnts’ chllenges nd ffrmng t dstrct ct’s judgnt low T defendnts petted t US Sre Ct  certr nd follg t Ct’s decs n Sesss v D 584 US __ (2018) t Ct remnded tr cse bck  t Ffth Crcut   csdert n lght  tht decs After requestng splentl brefng  t prtes  t effect  D t Ffth Crcut ffrd n prt nd vcted n prt
18 USC § 924(c) ctns  n “elents cluse” nd  “resdul cluse” T elents cluse defnes n fense s  cr  volence f t “hs s n elent t use ttempted use  thretened use  physcl ce gnst t pers  property  notr” nd t resdul cluse defnes n fense s  cr  volence f t “ ts nture nvolves  substntl rsk tht physcl ce gnst t pers  property  notr   used n t cse  commttng t fense” In D t Ct ddressed (nd nvldted)  resdul cluse dentcl  t resdul cluse n § 924(c)   not ddress t elents cluse Thus t Ffth Crcut ld t resdul cluse n 924(c) uncsttutlly vgue  D   not nvldte t elents cluse n tht sect As  result  t holdng t Ffth Crcut ffrd ts pr judgnt s  t Hobbs Act robry count  vcted s  t dng nd ttng csprcy count cuse t r reles  t elents cluse whle t ltter reles  t resdul cluse

Hmd Mohd Ahd Al Rehf ws present n t Unted Sttes  n F-1 nmmgrnt student vs  study t Fld Insttute  Technology He ws cdemclly dsmssed n Decemr 2014 nd  mmgrt sttus ws termnted n Februry 2015 Rtr thn deprtng t country Rehf remned nd n Decemr 2015 nt   shootng rnge purchsed  box  mmunt nd rented  frerm  n h Sx dys lter n employee t t hotel wre Rehf ws styng repted  t polce tht Rehf hd en ctng strngely Follg   t tp n FBI gent spoke wth Rehf  dmtted frng frerms t t shootng rnge nd kng tht  student vs ws   sttus cuse  ws no lger  student Rehf csented   serch   hotel room wre gents found t remnder  t mmunt  purchsed
A federl grnd jury chrged Rehf wth two counts  voltng 18 USC § 922(g)(5)(A) whch prohbts  pers  “s lleglly  unlwfully n t Unted Sttes”  possessng “ny frerm  mmunt” T penlty  voltng tht sttute descrd n 18 USC § 924()(2) s  fne mprsnt    10 yers  
At trl t gnnt requested  jury nstruct tht “[t] Unted Sttes s not requred  prove tht t defendnt knew tht  ws lleglly  unlwfully n t Unted Sttes” Rehf objected  t nstruct rgung tht t gnnt hd  prove  tht  hd kngly possessed  frerm nd tht  hd kn tht  ws lleglly  unlwfully n t Unted Sttes wn  possessed t frerm” T gnnt l requested t nstruct tht “[t] len’s sttus cos unlwful  t dte  t sttus volt”; Rehf requested nsted t nstruct tht “[] pers dmtted  t Unted Sttes   student vs es not co unlwfully present untl n Immgrt Offcer  n Immgrt judge determnes tht [] h[s] volted [] student sttus” T dstrct ct nstructed t jury s requested  t gnnt nd ruled Rehf’s object T Eleventh Crcut ffrd t cvcts ctng bndng crcut precedent holdng tht t gnnt es not need  prove tht t defendnt knew   prohbted sttus s ll s precedents  otr crcuts nd lck  ct  Cgress  lter t lw (suggestng t comm judcl cstruct  t lw ws wht Cgress ntended)

Jmr Qurles ws chrged wth ng  fel n possess   frerm n volt  18 USC § 922(g) At  gnl sentencng t dstrct ct ld tht Qurles’s cvct  thrd-degree ho nvs ws  volent fely  t resdul cluse  t Ard Creer Crmnl Act (“ACCA”)  declned  rule wtr t fense csttuted generc burglry Fndng t fel-n-possess cvct    thrd fense  t ACCA t ct sentenced Qurles  204 mths n prs In lght  t US Sre Ct’s decs n Johns v Unted Sttes 576 US __ (2015) n whch t ld uncsttutlly vgue t resdul cluse  t ACCA t US Ct  Appels  t Sxth Crcut remnded t cse  resentencng T dstrct ct found tht Mchgn’s cr  thrd-degree ho nvs csttuted  “volent fely”  t ACCA nd resentenced Qurles  204 mths’ ncrcert
Under federl lw  generc burglry s “n unlwful  unprvleged entry n  remnng n  buldng  otr structure wth ntent  commt  cr” Mchgn lw defnes t cr  thrd-degree ho nvs s brekng nd enterng  dllng wth ntent  commt  msde n t dllng enterng t dllng wth permss wth ntent  commt  msde n t dllng  brekng nd enterng  dllng nd whle enterng  present n t dllng commttng  msde T thrd opt  ntent s t subject  t present dspute Both t dstrct ct nd t Sxth Crcut found unpersusve Qurles’s rgunt tht t Mchgn cr lcks t ntent--entry elent tht s requred  generc burglry Under bndng Sxth Crcut precedent generc burglry es not requre ntent t entry  t Mchgn cr  thrd-degree ho nvs s not broder thn t cr  generc burglry

From Februry  Septemr 2006 Coce provded securty servces  t subctrct Ech mth t US gnnt pd Coce t lest $1 mll  thn t  hve pd ArmGro hd ArmGro en wrded t subctrct plus otr expenses relted  Coce not ng dequtely eqped  perm t servces requred In 2006 Shw  hd cstrted t frudulent wrd  t subctrct  Coce rotted   Irq nd Prss mdtely reopened t subctrct  bddng nd wrded t  ArmGro
Severl yers lter n 2010 FBI gents nterved Prss employee Blly Joe Hunt b  role n  seprte kckbck sc nd  tht ntervew Hunt nd t gents b t ctrcts’ frudulent sc nvolvng t subctrct  securty servces Hunt ws chrged wth federl crs relted  t kckbck sc nd served ten mths n federl prs
After  ws relesed n 2013 Hunt fled  qu tm ct  sel llegng tht Prss nd Coce hd volted t Flse Clms Act (FCA) 31 USC §§ 3729–33  submttng  t Unted Sttes flse  frudulent clms  pynt T Unted Sttes declned  ntervene n t ct nd Hunt’s complnt ws unseled T ctrcts moved  dsmss rgung tht Hunt’s clm ws brred  t sttute  lmtts n 31 USC § 3731(b)(1) whch requres  cvl ct llegng n FCA volt   br wthn t lter  (1) “6 yers fter t dte  whch t volt … s commtted”  (2) “3 yers fter t dte wn fcts mterl  t rght  ct re kn  resbly  hve en kn  t fcl  t Unted Sttes chrged wth respsblty  ct n t crcumstnces…” T dstrct ct grnted t ctrcts’ mot  dsmss fndng tht  etr provs Hunt’s clm   t-brred Revewng t dstrct ct’s dsmssl de novo t US Ct  Appels  t Eleventh Crcut reversed nd remnded T Eleventh Crcut ld tht wn Hunt (t relt) lerned  t frud s mmterl  sttute  lmtt purposes nd thus t perod gn  run wn gnnt fcls lerned  t fcts gvng rse  t clm

Cstructed wth fundng  t EPA n t 1970s t County  Mu’s Lhn Wstewter Reclmt Fclty trets wstewter generted  hos nd busness n t stern prt  Mu  njectng treted wstewter (clled “effluent”) n ground nject ctrol (UIC) lls— comm thod used  muncpltes  dspose  effluent Bee nject effluent s treted  et R-1 wter stndrds Hw’s hgst stndrds  recycled wter So  t treted effluent s used  rest nd golf cse rrgt Up nject effluent mdtely mxes wth groundwter nd dsperses vertclly nd hztlly eventully mgrtng  t ocen Over 90%  t effluent/groundwter mxture enters t ocen  dffuse flow wth no dentfble entry pt Repts  1973 1991 nd 1994 ndcte tht  t EPA nd t Hw Deprtnt  Helth (HDOH) sod tht t wstewter entered t ocen nd netr gency suggested tht t result requred NPDES permttng

In Ffth Thrd Bncp v Dudenhoeffer 573 US __ (2014) t Sre Ct unnmously ld tht  t Employee Retrent Inco Securty Act  1974 (ERISA) fducres  n employee sck ershp pln (ESOP) re not enttled   presumpt  prudence regrdng tr decss  buy  hold employer sck Rtr   plntff  stte  clm  brech  t fducry duty  prudence bsed  nsde nmt t plntff need ly “plusbly llege tht  prudent fducry n t defendnt’s post  not hve ccluded tht [n lterntve ct]    hrm thn good  t fund” Thus t Ct estblsd  “ctext-specfc” pledng stndrd rtr thn  generlzed presumpt stndrd
IBM fers s  neft  ts employees n ERISA-qulfed ESOP nvested premnntly n IBM comm sck wth Retrent Plns Commttee  IBM s t fducry In 2015 two substntlly smlr lwsuts re fled gnst IBM nd ts fcers e  securtes lws nd t otr  ERISA Both lwsuts lleged tht IBM frudulently cceled problems wth t compny’s mcroelectrcs unt tre rtfclly nfltng IBM’s repted vlue By ctnung  nvest n IBM sck despte llegedly kng tht t mrket prce ws rtfclly nflted due  t frudulent sc t plntffs n t ERISA lwsut rgued tht t ESOP’s fducres brecd tr duty  prudence  Sect 404  ERISA
T dstrct ct dsmssed t ERISA lwsut  flure  stte  clm fndng tht t plntffs fled  et t pledng stndrd estblsd n Ffth Thrd s ty hd not lleged fcts sng tht t fducres “ not hve ccluded” tht publcly dsclosng t lleged “frud”  hltng  nvestnts n IBM sck    lkely  hrm t fund thn  lp t
T plntffs nded tr complnt  dd generc llegts tht dsclosure  t lleged frud ws “nevtble” nd tht t mgntude  t sck prce crect resultng   delyed dsclosure  ncrese  t T plntffs l dded  clm tht t fducres  hve voded ng  hrm thn good  nsted purchsng  “low-cost” dgng product
T dstrct ct gn dsmssed t lwsut  flng  et t Ffth Thrd pledng stndrd nd cuse  prudent fducry  resbly fnd tr proposed lterntve lkely  cuse  hrm thn good T US Ct  Appels  t Secd Crcut reversed fndng tht “wn  ‘drop n t vlue  t sck lredy ld  t fund’ s nevtble t s fr  plusble tht  prudent fducry  prefer  lmt t effects  t sck’s rtfcl nflt  t ESOP’s nefcres  prompt dsclosure”

In 2008 lnwners wthn t Ancd Serfund ste sued Atlntc Rchfeld n Mtn stte ct llegng tht t slter operts ten 1884 nd 1980 hd cused dmge  tr propertes Atlntc Rchfeld rsed no objects  t plntffs’ clms  loss  use nd enjoynt  property dmnut  vlue ncdentl nd csequentl dmges nd nnoynce nd dscomt Hover t  object  t comm-lw clm  “restt” dmges
To estblsh  clm  restt dmges n Mtn plntffs must prove tht ty wll ctully use t wrd  clen  t ste T plntffs n t cse lleged tht restt  tr property requres “wk n excess  wht t EPA requred  Atlntc Rchfeld n ts selected redy” Atlntc Rchfeld moved  summry judgnt rgung tht t restt clm csttuted  “chllenge”  t EPA’s redy nd thus ws jursdctlly brred  CERCLA § 113 whch deprves cts  jursdct  r chllenges  EPA-selected redes Atlntc Rchfeld l rgued tht t lnwners re “potentlly respsble prtes” nd thus must seek EPA pprovl  42 USC § 9622(e)(6)  CERCLA e enggng n redl ct Fnlly Atlntc Rchfeld rgued tht CERCLA preempted stte comm-lw clms  restt
T trl ct ld tht CERCLA permtted plntffs’ clm  restt dmges nd Atlntc Rchfeld s  wrt  servsy ctrol  t Mtn Sre Ct whch t ct grnted Over  dssent t Sre Ct  Mtn rejected ll three  Atlntc Rchfeld’s rgunts ffrmng t trl ct’s decs permttng t plntffs  proceed   jury trl  tr restt clm

In 2003 t two prtes entered n  settlent greent  relve  trdemrk dspute n whch Lucky Brnd greed not  use “Get Lucky” nd Mrcel greed  relese certn clms t mght hve n t future rsng   ts trdemrks T two prtes ctest t scope  Mrcel’s relese  clms wth Mrcel ctendng tht t ly relesed clms s  nfrngent tht occurred pr  t 2003 execut  t greent nd Lucky Brnd rgung tht t relesed ny future clm Mrcel  hve n relt  ny trdemrk regstered pr  t execut  t greent Furtr ltgt ensued

A jury found tht Fossl hd nfrnged Romg’s trdemrk nd ptents  tht ne  t volts re wllful T jury wrded Romg trdemrk dmges  two tes:  $90000 n prts “ prevent unjust enrchnt” nd  $67 mll n prts “ deter future trdemrk nfrngent” F t ltter wrd t jury found tht Fossl hd cted wth “cllous dsregrd”  Romg’s trdemrk rghts Hover t dstrct ct struck t jury’s wrd fndng tht “ fndng  wllfulness remns  requrent  n wrd  defendnts’ prts n t Crcut” On ppel t Federl Crcut ffrd fndng tht wthn t Secd Crcut  sng  wllfulness ws requred  n wrd  prts Romg petted t US Sre Ct   wrt  certr In lght  ts decs n SCA Hygene Products Aktebolg v Frst Qulty B Products LLC 580 US __ (2017) tht ffected t ptent nfrngent clms n t cse t Ct grnted t pett vcted t Federl Crcut’s decs nd remnded t cse On remnd t Federl Crcut reffrd t dstrct ct’s judgnt declnng  wrd Fossl’s prts

F   century fter t Alsk Purchse n 1867 t federl gnnt hd no settled polcy  recognt  Alsk Ntve gros s Indn trs In 1971 Cgress encted t Alsk Ntve Clms Settlent Act (ANCSA) whch uthzed t cret  two types  cpts  receve mey nd lnd: Alsk Ntve Regl Cpts nd Alsk Ntve Vllge Cpts (collectvely ANCs)
In 1975 Cgress encted t Indn Self-Determnt nd Educt Assstnce Act (ISDA)  “lp Indn trs ssu respsblty  d progrms tht neft tr mrs” ISDA defnes n “Indn tr” s “ny Indn tr bnd nt  otr gnzed gro  communty ncludng ny Alsk Ntve vllge  regl  vllge cpt s defned n  estblsd pursunt  t Alsk Ntve Clms Settlent Act (85 Stt 688) whch s recognzed s elgble  t specl progrms nd servces provded  t Unted Sttes  Indns cuse  tr sttus s Indns”
In 2020 Cgress pssed t Cvrus Ad Relef nd Ecomc Securty Act (CARES Act) Ttle V  whch mkes certn funds vlble  t recognzed gnng bodes  ny "Indn Tr" s tht term s defned n t Indn Self-Determnt nd Educt Assstnce Act (ISDA) T Deprtnt  t Tresury ccluded tht ANCs re elgble  receve Ttle V funds
Sx federlly recognzed trs n Alsk nd tlve federlly recognzed trs n t lor 48 sttes chllenged tht determnt rgung tht ANCs re not “Indn Trs” wthn t nng  t CARES Act  ISDA Although t gnnt cceded tht ANCs hve not en tclly recognzed s elgble  specl progrms nd servces cuse  tr sttus s Indns t nevertless rgued tht Cgress expressly ncluded ANCs wthn t ISDA defnt
T dstrct ct grnted summry judgnt  t defendnts fndng tht ANCs must qulfy s Indn trs  gve effect  tr express nclus n t ISDA defnt even though no ANC hs en recognzed s n Indn tr T US Ct  Appels  t Dstrct  Columb reversed holdng tht ANCs re not elgble  fundng  Ttle V  t CARES Act cuse ty re not “recognzed” s Indn trs
